  3133                                  
  3134                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  3135                                  
  3136                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  3137                                  ;
  3138                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  3139                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  3140                                  
  3141 0000083B 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  3142                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  3143 0000083D 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  3144 00000841 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  3145 00000845 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  3146 00000849 [4D08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  3147 0000084B 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  3148                                  
  3149                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  3150                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  3151                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  3152                                  
  3153 0000084D 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  3154 00000851 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  3155 00000853 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  3156 00000857 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  3157 00000859 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  3158 0000085B 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  3159 0000085D 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  3160                                  
  3161                                  NextStack:
  3162                                  
  3163                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  3164                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  3165                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  3166                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  3167                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  3168                                  
  3169 0000085F 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  3170 00000863 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  3171 00000865 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  3172 00000869 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  3173 0000086B 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table
  3174                                  
  3175                                  					;SR;
  3176 0000086F 00                      IsWin386:	db 0			; Flag to indicate whether
  3177                                  					; Win386 is running or not
  3178                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3179                                  
  3180                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  3181                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about 
  3182                                  ;30 bytes, we might as well put it in BIOS_DATA
  3183                                  
  3184                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:			
  3185 00000870 57                      		push	di
  3186 00000871 06                      		push	es
  3187 00000872 53                      		push	bx
  3188 00000873 50                      		push	ax
  3189 00000874 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  3190 00000876 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  3191 00000878 BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  3192 0000087B B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  3193 0000087E CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  3194                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  3195                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  3196 00000880 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3197 00000882 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  3198 00000884 740A                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  3199                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  3200 00000886 0E                      		push	cs
  3201                                  		;;mov	ax,offset Skip
  3202                                  		;mov	ax,Skip
  3203                                  		;push	ax
  3204                                  		; 08/10/2023
  3205 00000887 68[9008]                		push	Skip
  3206 0000088A 06                      		push	es
  3207 0000088B 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  3208 0000088C B80100                  		mov	ax,1		; SetFocus function number
  3209 0000088F CB                      		retf			; do the call
  3210                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3211                                  
  3212                                  Skip:					
  3213 00000890 58                      		pop	ax
  3214 00000891 5B                      		pop	bx
  3215 00000892 07                      		pop	es
  3216 00000893 5F                      		pop	di
  3217 00000894 CB                      		retf
  3218                                  
  3219                                  ;End WIN386 support
  3220

  3222

  3491 0000127B 00                      		db 0
  3492                                  
  3493                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3494                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3495                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3496                                  
  3497                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3498                                  
  3499                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3500                                  ;
  3501                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3502                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3503                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3504                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3505                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3506                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3507                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3508                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3509                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3510                                  ;
  3511                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3512                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3513                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3514                                  ;
  3515                                  ;	uses:	
  3516                                  ;
  3517                                  ;
  3518                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3519                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3520                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3521                                  ;
  3522                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3523                                  
  3524                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3525                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3526                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3527                                  
  3528                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3529                                  
  3530                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3531                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3532                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3533                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3534                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3535                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3536                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3537                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3538                                  
  3539                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3540                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3541                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3542                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3543                                  
  3544                                  ; 30/12/2022
  3545                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:12DEh)
  3546                                  
  3547                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3548 0000127C 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3549 0000127F 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3550 00001281 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3551 00001284 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3552 00001286 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3553 00001289 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3554                                  atd1:
  3555 0000128B 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3556                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3557                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3558                                  
  3559                                  atd2:					
  3560 00001290 53                      		push	bx
  3561 00001291 51                      		push	cx
  3562 00001292 52                      		push	dx
  3563 00001293 57                      		push	di
  3564 00001294 1E                      		push	ds
  3565 00001295 06                      		push	es
  3566 00001296 50                      		push	ax
  3567 00001297 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3568                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3569 0000129A 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3570                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3571 0000129C C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3572                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3573                                  					; initially no error code.
  3574 000012A1 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3575 000012A4 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3576                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3577 000012A8 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3578                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3579 000012AA C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3580 000012AF EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3581                                  					; return
  3582                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3583                                  
  3584                                  atd3:					
  3585 000012B1 53                      		push	bx
  3586 000012B2 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3587 000012B4 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3588 000012B7 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3589 000012B9 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3590 000012BB 5B                      		pop	bx
  3591 000012BC 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3592 000012BF 0E                      		push	cs
  3593 000012C0 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3594 000012C3 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3595 000012C5 58                      		pop	ax
  3596 000012C6 50                      		push	ax
  3597 000012C7 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3598 000012CA BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3599 000012CD EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3600 000012CE E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3601                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3602                                  
  3603                                  atd4:	
  3604                                  
  3605                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3606                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3607                                  				
  3608 000012D1 58                      		pop	ax
  3609                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3610 000012D2 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3611 000012D6 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3612 000012D8 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3613 000012DA F9                      		stc
  3614                                  atd5:					
  3615 000012DB 07                      		pop	es
  3616 000012DC 1F                      		pop	ds
  3617 000012DD 5F                      		pop	di
  3618 000012DE 5A                      		pop	dx
  3619 000012DF 59                      		pop	cx
  3620 000012E0 5B                      		pop	bx
  3621 000012E1 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3622                                  
  3623                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3624                                  
  3625                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3626                                  ;
  3627                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3628                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3629                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3630                                  ;	
  3631                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3632                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3633                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3634                                  ;
  3635                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3636                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3637                                  ;
  3638                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3639                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3640                                  
  3641                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3642                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3643                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3644 000012E4 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3645                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3646 000012E7 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3647 000012EC 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3648 000012EF 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3649 000012F1 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3650                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3651                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3652                                  setc1:					
  3653 000012F6 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3654 000012F8 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3655                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3656                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3657 000012FA A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3658 000012FD 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3659 00001301 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3660 00001303 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3661                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3662 00001306 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3663 00001309 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3664 0000130B C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3665 0000130E 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3666 00001311 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3667 00001313 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3668                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3669 00001315 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3670 00001318 06                      		push	es
  3671 00001319 53                      		push	bx
  3672 0000131A 0E                      		push	cs
  3673 0000131B E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3674 0000131E 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3675                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3676 00001322 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3677                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3678 00001325 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3679                                  					; only use low part
  3680 00001328 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3681                                  					; control byte modifier
  3682 0000132C 5B                      		pop	bx
  3683 0000132D 07                      		pop	es
  3684                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3685 0000132E 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3686 00001332 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3687 00001335 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3688                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3689 00001337 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3690 0000133B C3                      		retn
  3691                                  
  3692                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3693                                  
  3694                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3695                                  ;
  3696                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3697                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3698                                  ;
  3699                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3700                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3701                                  ;
  3702                                  ;	
  3703                                  ;
  3704                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3705                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3706                                  ;
  3707                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3708                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3709                                  
  3710                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3711 0000133C 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3712 0000133E 0E                      		push	cs
  3713 0000133F E84000                  		call	command
  3714 00001342 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3715                                  doc1:					
  3716 00001344 0E                      		push	cs
  3717 00001345 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3718 00001348 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3719 0000134A B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3720 0000134D BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3721 00001350 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3722 00001351 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3723                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3724                                  
  3725                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3726                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3727                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3728                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3729                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3730                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3731                                  ;
  3732                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3733                                  
  3734                                  rsct_loop:				
  3735 00001352 6D                      		insw
  3736 00001353 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3737 00001355 FB                      		sti
  3738                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3739 00001356 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3740                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3741                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3742 0000135B 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3743 0000135D 0E                      		push	cs
  3744 0000135E E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3745 00001361 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3746 00001363 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3747 00001366 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3748 00001369 FA                      		cli
  3749 0000136A F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3750 0000136C FB                      		sti
  3751                                  doc2:					
  3752 0000136D 0E                      		push	cs
  3753 0000136E E82900                  		call	check_status
  3754 00001371 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3755                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3756 00001373 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3757 00001377 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3758                                  doc3:					
  3759 00001379 C3                      		retn
  3760                                  
  3761                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3762                                  
  3763                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3764                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3765                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3766                                  
  3767                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3768                                  
  3769                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3770                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3771                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3772                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3773                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3774                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3775                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3776                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3777                                  
  3778                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3779                                  ;
  3780                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3781                                  ;
  3782                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3783                                  ;
  3784                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3785                                  ;
  3786                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3787                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3788                                  ;	
  3789                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3790                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3791                                  
  3792                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3793                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3794                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3795                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3796 0000137A 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3797 0000137D EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3798                                  
  3799                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3800                                  
  3801                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3802                                  ;
  3803                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3804                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3805                                  ;
  3806                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3807                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3808                                  ;
  3809                                  ;
  3810                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3811                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3812                                  ;
  3813                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3814                                  
  3815                                  command:	; proc near		
  3816                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3817                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3818                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3819 00001382 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3820 00001385 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3821                                  
  3822                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3823                                  
  3824                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3825                                  ;
  3826                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3827                                  ;
  3828                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3829                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3830                                  ;
  3831                                  ;
  3832                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3833                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3834                                  ;		
  3835                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3836                                  
  3837                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3838                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3839                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3840                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3841 0000138A 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3842 0000138D EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3843                                  
  3844                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3845                                  
  3846                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3847                                  ;
  3848                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3849                                  ;
  3850                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3851                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3852                                  ;
  3853                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3854                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3855                                  
  3856                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3857                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3858                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3859                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3860 00001392 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3861 00001395 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3862                                  
  3863                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3864                                  
  3865                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3866                                  ;
  3867                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3868                                  ;
  3869                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3870                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3871                                  ;
  3872                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3873                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3874                                  
  3875                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3876                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3877                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3878                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3879 0000139A 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3880 0000139D EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3881                                  
  3882                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3883                                  
  3884                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3885                                  ;
  3886                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3887                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3888                                  ;
  3889                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3890                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3891                                  ;
  3892                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3893                                  
  3894                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3895                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3896                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3897                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3898 000013A2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3899 000013A5 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3900                                  
  3901                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3902                                  
  3903                                  endatrom:
  3904                                  
  3905                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3906                                  
  3907                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3908                                  ;;
  3909                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3910                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3911                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3912                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3913                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3914                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3915                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3916                                  
  3917                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3918 000013AA 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3919                                  					;
  3920                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3921                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3922                                  					;
  3923                                  					; warning!!!
  3924                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3925 000013AD 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3926                                  no_hookit:				
  3927                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3928                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3929 000013AF 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3930                                  
  3931                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3932                                  
  3933                                  mebbe_hookit:
  3934 000013B4 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3935 000013B7 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3936 000013B9 1E                      		push	ds
  3937                                  		
  3938                                  		; 07/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3939                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1830h
  3940                                  		;push	ax
  3941                                  		;mov	ax, 40h
  3942                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  3943                                  		;pop	ax
  3944 000013BA 6A40                    		push	40h
  3945 000013BC 1F                      		pop	ds
  3946                                  
  3947 000013BD 9C                      		pushf
  3948                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3949                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3950 000013BE 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3951 000013C3 1F                      		pop	ds
  3952 000013C4 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3953                                  
  3954                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3955                                  
  3956 000013C7 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3957                                  
  3958                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3959                                  
  3960                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  3961                                  %if 0  
  3962                                  
  3963                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3964                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3965                                  
  3966                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3967                                  
  3968                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3969                                  ;
  3970                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3971                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3972                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3973                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3974                                  
  3975                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3976                                  		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3977                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3978                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3979                                  		jnb	short century20
  3980                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3981                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3982                                  		jmp	short years
  3983                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3984                                  		
  3985                                  century20:				
  3986                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3987                                  		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3988                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3989                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3990                                  years:					
  3991                                  		xor	dx, dx
  3992                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3993                                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3994                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3995                                  		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3996                                  		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3997                                  		mov	bl, 4
  3998                                  		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3999                                  		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  4000                                  		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  4001                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  4002                                  		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  4003                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  4004                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  4005                                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  4006                                  regularyear:				
  4007                                  		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  4008                                  		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  4009                                  		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  4010                                  		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  4011                                  		loop	regularyear	; }
  4012                                  					;
  4013                                  					; should never fall through loop
  4014                                  leapyear:				
  4015                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  4016                                  					; change month table.
  4017                                  yeardone:				
  4018                                  		xor	bx, bx
  4019                                  		xor	dx, dx
  4020                                  		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  4021                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  4022                                  		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  4023                                  		mov	cx, 12
  4024                                  months:					
  4025                                  		inc	bl
  4026                                  
  4027                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  4028                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  4029                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  4030                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  4031                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  4032                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  4033                                  		
  4034                                  		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  4035                                  		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  4036                                  					; dh=0
  4037                                  		jbe	short month_done
  4038                                  		inc	si		; next month
  4039                                  		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  4040                                  		loop	months		;
  4041                                  					; should never fall through loop
  4042                                  month_done:				
  4043                                  		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  4044                                  					; restore month table value
  4045                                  		mov	dl, bl
  4046                                  		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  4047                                  		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  4048                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4049                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  4050                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  4051                                  		xchg	dl, al
  4052                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4053                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  4054                                  		xchg	dh, al
  4055                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4056                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  4057                                  		xchg	cl, al
  4058                                  		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  4059                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  4060                                  		mov	ch, al
  4061                                  		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  4062                                  		retf
  4063                                  
  4064                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  4065                                  
  4066                                  %endif
  4067                                  
  4068                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4069                                  
  4070                                  ; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4071                                  %if 0  
  4072                                  
  4073                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  4074                                  
  4075                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  4076                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  4077                                  		
  4078                                  		push	cx		
  4079                                  		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bcd
  4080                                  		mov	cl, 4
  4081                                  		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  4082                                  		or	al, ah
  4083                                  		pop	cx
  4084                                  		retf
  4085                                  %endif
  4086                                  
  4087                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4088                                  
  4089                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  4090                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  4091                                  
  4092                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  4093                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  4094                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  4095                                  
  4096                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  4097                                  
  4098                                  	; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4099                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:183Eh
  4100                                  int_6Ch:
  4101 000013C8 0E                      		push	cs
  4102 000013C9 1F                      		pop	ds
  4103                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0  
  4104 000013CA 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0
  4105 000013CF 7405                    		jz      short int6c
  4106 000013D1 BB[9007]                		mov     bx, EnsureA20On
  4107 000013D4 FFD3                    		call    bx
  4108                                  int6c:					
  4109                                  		;push	cs
  4110                                  		;pop	ds
  4111 000013D6 8F06[B306]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  4112 000013DA 8F06[B506]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  4113 000013DE 9D                      		popf
  4114 000013DF E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  4115 000013E2 FA                      		cli
  4116 000013E3 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  4117 000013E7 FB                      		sti
  4118 000013E8 E8B900                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  4119 000013EB FA                      		cli
  4120 000013EC B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  4121 000013EE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  4122                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  4123                                  					; Return: time of day set
  4124 000013F0 FB                      		sti
  4125                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  4126                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4127 000013F1 FF2E[B306]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  4128                                  
  4129                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4130                                  
  4131                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  4132                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  4133                                  
  4134                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  4135 000013F5 50                      		push	ax
  4136 000013F6 51                      		push	cx
  4137 000013F7 52                      		push	dx
  4138 000013F8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  4139 000013FA CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  4140                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  4141                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  4142                                  					; midnight
  4143                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  4144 000013FC 5A                      		pop	dx
  4145 000013FD 59                      		pop	cx
  4146 000013FE 58                      		pop	ax
  4147 000013FF 50                      		push	ax
  4148 00001400 53                      		push	bx
  4149 00001401 51                      		push	cx
  4150 00001402 52                      		push	dx
  4151                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  4152                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4153                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:187Ah
  4154 00001403 C706[BB06]0100          		mov	word [daycnt2], 1
  4155                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  4156 00001409 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  4157 0000140B CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4158                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  4159                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  4160                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  4161                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  4162 0000140D 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  4163 0000140F E98300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  4164                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4165                                  
  4166                                  read_ok:
  4167 00001412 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  4168 00001416 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  4169 0000141A 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  4170 0000141E 8816[BA06]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4171                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4172                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4173                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 2
  4174 00001422 FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 2
  4175 00001426 E83401                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4176 00001429 726A                    		jb	short r_d_ret	; some value out of range
  4177                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4178                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4179                                  		;mov	byte [daycnt2], 3
  4180 0000142B FE06[BB06]              		inc	byte [daycnt2] ; 3
  4181 0000142F E8DB00                  		call	date_verify
  4182 00001432 7261                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4183                                  		;mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4184                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4185 00001434 C606[BB06]00            		mov	byte [daycnt2], 0
  4186 00001439 E8A100                  		call	in_bin
  4187 0000143C A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4188 0000143F 98                      		cbw
  4189 00001440 803E[B706]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4190 00001445 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4191 00001447 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4192                                  century_19:				
  4193 0000144A 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4194 0000144D B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4195 0000144F F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4196 00001451 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4197 00001453 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4198 00001454 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4199                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4200 00001457 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4201                                  		;mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4202                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4203 00001459 A3[BB06]                		mov	[daycnt2], ax
  4204 0000145C 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4205 0000145E 98                      		cbw
  4206 0000145F 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4207 00001461 740B                    		jz	short leap_year
  4208 00001463 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4209 00001466 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4210                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4211                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4212 00001468 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4213 0000146C EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4214                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4215                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4216                                  
  4217                                  leap_year:
  4218 0000146E 803E[B906]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4219 00001473 7604                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4220                                  leap_adjustment:
  4221                                  		;inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4222                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4223 00001475 FF06[BB06]              		inc	word [daycnt2]
  4224                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4225 00001479 8A0E[BA06]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4226 0000147D 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4227 0000147F 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4228                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4229                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4230 00001480 010E[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], cx
  4231 00001484 8A0E[B906]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4232                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4233                                  		;xor	ch, ch
  4234 00001488 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4235                                  		
  4236                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4237                                  		;shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4238                                  		;;mov	si, month_table
  4239                                  		;add	si, cx
  4240                                  		;; 16/10/2022
  4241                                  		;; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  4242                                  		;; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4243                                  		;; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4244                                  		;; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4245                                  		;mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4246                                  		;			; get #	days in	previous months
  4247                                  		;add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  4248                                  
  4249                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  4250                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:1907h
  4251 00001489 B400                    		mov	ah, 0
  4252 0000148B BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab
  4253                                  r_d_sum_loop:
  4254 0000148E AC                      		lodsb
  4255 0000148F 0106[BB06]              		add	[daycnt2], ax
  4256 00001493 E2F9                    		loop	r_d_sum_loop
  4257                                  r_d_ret:
  4258                                  		;mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  4259                                  		; 08/08/2023
  4260 00001495 8B36[BB06]              		mov	si, [daycnt2]
  4261 00001499 5A                      		pop	dx
  4262 0000149A 59                      		pop	cx
  4263 0000149B 5B                      		pop	bx
  4264 0000149C 58                      		pop	ax
  4265 0000149D C3                      		retn
  4266                                  
  4267                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4268                                  
  4269                                  r_t_retj:				
  4270 0000149E 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4271 000014A0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4272 000014A2 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4273                                  
  4274                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4275                                  
  4276                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4277                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4278                                  
  4279                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4280 000014A4 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4281 000014A6 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4282                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4283                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4284                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4285 000014A8 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4286 000014AA 882E[B706]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4287 000014AE 880E[B806]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4288 000014B2 8836[B906]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4289 000014B6 C606[BA06]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4290 000014BB E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4291 000014BE 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4292 000014C0 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4293 000014C3 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4294 000014C5 E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4295 000014C8 8A2E[B706]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4296 000014CC 8A0E[B806]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4297 000014D0 8A36[B906]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4298 000014D4 8A16[BA06]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4299                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4300                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4301                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4302 000014D8 FF1E[C106]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4303                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4304                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4305                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4306                                  r_t_ret:				
  4307 000014DC C3                      		retn
  4308                                  
  4309                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4310                                  
  4311                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4312                                  
  4313                                  in_bin:		; proc near
  4314 000014DD A0[B706]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4315 000014E0 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4316 000014E3 A2[B706]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4317 000014E6 A0[B806]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4318 000014E9 E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4319 000014EC A2[B806]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4320 000014EF A0[B906]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4321 000014F2 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4322 000014F5 A2[B906]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4323 000014F8 A0[BA06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4324 000014FB E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4325 000014FE A2[BA06]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4326 00001501 C3                      		retn
  4327                                  
  4328                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4329                                  
  4330                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4331                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4332                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4333                                  
  4334                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near
  4335 00001502 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4336 00001504 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4337 00001506 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4338 00001508 D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4339 0000150A D50A                    		aad
  4340 0000150C C3                      		retn
  4341                                  
  4342                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4343                                  
  4344                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4345                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4346                                  
  4347                                  date_verify:	; proc near
  4348 0000150D 803E[B706]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4349 00001512 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4350 00001514 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4351 00001516 803E[B706]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4352                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4353                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4354 0000151B 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4355 0000151D 803E[B806]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4356                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4357                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4358 00001522 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4359                                  century_20:
  4360 00001524 803E[B806]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4361 00001529 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4362 0000152B 803E[B906]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4363 00001530 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4364 00001532 803E[B906]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4365                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4366 00001537 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4367 00001539 803E[BA06]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4368 0000153E 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4369                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4370                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4371                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4372                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4373                                  		; cf=0
  4374                                  		;clc
  4375                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4376 00001540 803E[BA06]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4377 00001545 C3                      		retn
  4378                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4379                                  
  4380                                  date_error:
  4381 00001546 F9                      		stc
  4382                                  date_err2:
  4383 00001547 C3                      		retn
  4384                                  
  4385                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4386                                  
  4387                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4388                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4389                                  
  4390                                  time_verify:	; proc near
  4391 00001548 803E[B706]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4392 0000154D 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4393 0000154F 803E[B806]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4394 00001554 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4395                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4396                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4397                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4398                                  		;clc
  4399                                  		;retn
  4400                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4401 00001556 803E[B906]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4402                                  time_error:
  4403                                  bv_error:
  4404 0000155B F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4405 0000155C C3                      		retn
  4406                                  
  4407                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4408                                  
  4409                                  ;time_error:				
  4410                                  		;stc
  4411                                  		;retn
  4412                                  
  4413                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4414                                  
  4415                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4416                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4417                                  
  4418                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near
  4419 0000155D B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4420 00001560 BB[B706]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4421                                  bv_loop:
  4422 00001563 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4423 00001565 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4424 00001567 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4425                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4426 0000156A 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4427 0000156C 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4428 0000156E D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4429 00001570 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4430 00001572 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4431 00001574 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4432 00001576 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4433 00001579 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4434 0000157C 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4435 0000157E 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4436 0000157F 49                      		dec	cx
  4437 00001580 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4438 00001582 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4439 00001583 C3                      		retn
  4440                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4441                                  
  4442                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4443                                  ;bv_error:
  4444                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4445                                  		;retn
  4446                                  
  4447                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4448                                  
  4449                                  endk09:

  4451                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4452                                  
  4453                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4454                                  ;									:
  4455                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4456                                  ;									:
  4457                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4458                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4459                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4460                                  ;									:
  4461                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4462                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4463                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4464                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4465                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4466                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4467                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4468                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4469                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4470                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4471                                  ;		this program.						:
  4472                                  ;									:
  4473                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4474                                  
  4475                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4476                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4477                                  
  4478                                  ; drvfat must be the first location of freeable space!
  4479                                  
  4480                                  ; 22/12/2022
  4481                                  align 2
  4482                                  		;db 90h
  4483                                  
  4484                                  ; 30/12/2022
  4485                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:16D6h)
  4486                                  
  4487 00001584 0000                    drvfat:		dw 0			; drive	and fat	id of dos
  4488 00001586 0000                    bios_l:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (low word)
  4489 00001588 0000                    bios_h:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (high word)
  4490 0000158A 0000                    doscnt:		dw 0			; how many sectors to read
  4491 0000158C 00                      fbigfat:	db 0			; flags	for drive
  4492 0000158D 0000                    fatloc:		dw 0			; seg addr of fat sector
  4493 0000158F 0000                    init_bootseg:	dw 0			; seg addr of buffer for reading boot record
  4494 00001591 80                      rom_drv_num:	db 80h			; rom drive number
  4495 00001592 0002                    md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4496 00001594 0000                    temp_cluster:	dw 0			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4497 00001596 FFFF                    last_fat_sec_num: dw 0FFFFh		; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4498                                  
  4499                                  ; the following two bytes are used to save the info returned by int 13, ah = 8
  4500                                  ; call to determine drive parameters.

  4733                                  ;	entry point to call utility functions in Bios_Code. At this time,
  4734                                  ;	  we aren't doing any A20 switching. During MSINIT time Bios_Code
  4735                                  ;	  will not yet be moved to its final resting place, so we know
  4736                                  ;	  it'll be low.
  4737                                  ;
  4738                                  ;	to use this function, do a "push cs" and load bp with the offset of
  4739                                  ;	  the function you want to call in Bios_Code. This routine will
  4740                                  ;	  push the address of a retf in Bios_Code onto the stack which
  4741                                  ;	  will get executed when the utility function finishes. It will
  4742                                  ;	  then transfer control to Bios_Code:bp using a couple of pushes
  4743                                  ;	  and a retf
  4744                                  
  4745                                  ; 16/10/2022
  4746                                  ;BC_RETF equ bc_retf - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  4747                                  ; 09/12/2022
  4748                                  BC_RETF equ bc_retf
  4749                                  
  4750                                  addr_of_bcretf:	;dw 0C8h		; dw bc_retf
  4751                                  					; 2C7h:0C8h = 70h:2638h
  4752 0000161D [CA00]                  		dw BC_RETF
  4753                                  
  4754                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4755                                  
  4756                                  call_bios_code:	; proc far			
  4757 0000161F 2EFF36[1D16]            		push	word [cs:addr_of_bcretf] 
  4758                                  					; set up near return to far return
  4759 00001624 2EFF36[BF06]            		push	word [cs:cdev+2] ; push Bios_Code segment
  4760 00001629 55                      		push	bp		; save offset of utility function
  4761 0000162A CB                      		retf			; far jump to (DOS)BIOS code
  4762
