  7509                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7510                                  
  7511                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7512                                  ;
  7513                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7514                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7515                                  ;
  7516                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7517                                  ;
  7518                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7519                                  ;   initialize it.
  7520                                  ;
  7521                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7522                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7523                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7524                                  ;
  7525                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7526                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7527                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7528                                  ;
  7529                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7530                                  ;   save coding.
  7531                                  ;
  7532                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7533                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7534                                  ;
  7535                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7536                                  ;
  7537                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7538                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7539                                  ;
  7540                                  ; called modules:
  7541                                  ;		  getboot
  7542                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7543                                  ;
  7544                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7545                                  ;
  7546                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7547                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7548                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7549                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7550                                  ;
  7551                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7552                                  
  7553                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7554                                  domini:	
  7555 00001FB8 8A36[0B16]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7556                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7557 00001FBC 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7558                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7559 00001FBE 7430                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7560 00001FC0 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7561                                  domini_loop:				
  7562 00001FC2 52                      		push	dx
  7563 00001FC3 8816[0A16]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7564 00001FC7 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7565 00001FC9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7566                                  					; DL = drive number
  7567                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7568                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7569                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7570                                  		
  7571                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7572                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7573                                  		;inc	dh
  7574                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7575                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7576 00001FCB 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7577 00001FCD 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7578 00001FCF 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7579 00001FD0 A3[1016]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7580                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7581                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7582                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7583 00001FD3 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7584 00001FD5 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7585 00001FD8 A3[1216]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7586 00001FDB 06                      		push	es
  7587 00001FDC 8A16[0A16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7588 00001FE0 E882FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7589                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7590 00001FE3 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7591 00001FE5 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7592                                  domininext:				
  7593 00001FE8 07                      		pop	es
  7594 00001FE9 5A                      		pop	dx
  7595 00001FEA FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7596 00001FEC FECE                    		dec	dh
  7597 00001FEE 75D2                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7598                                  dominiret:				
  7599 00001FF0 C3                      		retn
  7600                                  
  7601                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7602                                  
  7603                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7604                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7605                                  
  7606                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7607                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7608                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7609                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7610                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7611                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7612                                  ;
  7613                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7614                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7615                                  
  7616                                  
  7617                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7618 00001FF1 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7619                                  fmpnext:				
  7620 00001FF5 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7621 00001FF9 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7622 00001FFB 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7623 00001FFE 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7624 00002002 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7625                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7626                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7627                                  fmpnextfound:
  7628 00002004 C3                      		retn
  7629                                  
  7630                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7631                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7632                                  ;fmpret:
  7633                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7634                                  
  7635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7636                                  
  7637                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7638                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7639 00002005 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7640 00002008 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7641 0000200A 8B3E[0E16]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7642 0000200E C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7643                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7644 00002013 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7645                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7646                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7647 00002017 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7648                                  					; ffHardFile
  7649 0000201B C606[8C15]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7650 00002020 A1[1016]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7651 00002023 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7652 00002026 A1[1216]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7653 00002029 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7654 0000202C A0[0A16]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7655 0000202F 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7656                                  					; set physical number
  7657 00002032 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7658 00002035 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7659                                  					; set logical number
  7660 00002038 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7661 0000203D 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7662 0000203F 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7663                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7664 00002044 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7665                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7666                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7667 00002046 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7668 00002049 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7669 0000204D 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7670 00002050 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7671 00002052 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7672 00002054 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7673 00002058 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7674                                  					; set hidden trks
  7675 0000205B 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7676 0000205F 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7677 00002063 8A16[0A16]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7678 00002067 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7679 0000206A B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7680 0000206D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7681                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7682                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7683                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7684 0000206F 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7685 00002071 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7686                                  
  7687                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7688                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  7689 00002074 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  7690 0000207A 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  7691                                  
  7692                                  		; 13/08/2023
  7693                                  		;push	es
  7694 0000207C E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7695                                  					; bx value saved.
  7696                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  7697 0000207F 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  7698 00002081 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7699                                  fmpnextchain:
  7700 00002084 E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7701                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7702                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7703                                  
  7704                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7705                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7706                                  		;retn
  7707                                  
  7708                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7709                                  
  7710                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

  7712                                  
  7713                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7714                                  	
  7715 00002087 57                      		push	di
  7716 00002088 53                      		push	bx
  7717                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7718                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7719                                  		;push	ds
  7720 00002089 06                      		push	es
  7721                                  setmini_1:				
  7722 0000208A 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7723 0000208E 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7724 00002090 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7725 00002094 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7726 00002096 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  7727 0000209A 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7728 0000209C 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7729 0000209F 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7730 000020A3 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7731 000020A5 F9                      		stc
  7732 000020A6 07                      		pop	es
  7733                                  		; 12/08/2023
  7734                                  		;pop	ds
  7735 000020A7 5B                      		pop	bx
  7736 000020A8 5F                      		pop	di
  7737 000020A9 C3                      		retn
  7738                                  
  7739                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7740                                  setmini_2:
  7741 000020AA E964FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7742

  7745                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2

  7747                                  
  7748                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7749                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7750                                  ;
  7751                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7752                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7753                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7754                                  ;
  7755                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7756                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7757                                  ;			trash ax
  7758                                  
  7759                                  dmax_check:
  7760 000020AD 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7761 000020B2 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7762 000020B4 06                      		push	es
  7763                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7764 000020B5 B84304                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7765 000020B8 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7766                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7767 000020BA 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7768                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7769                                  					; set message flag
  7770                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7771 000020C0 07                      		pop	es
  7772                                  
  7773                                  		;;push	es
  7774                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7775                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7776                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7777                                  					; set message flag
  7778                                  		;;pop	es
  7779                                  		;
  7780                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7781                                  dmax_ok:
  7782 000020C1 C3                      		retn
  7783                                  
  7784                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7785                                  
  7786                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7787                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7788                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7789                                  ;								 
  7790                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7791                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7792                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7793                                  
  7794                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7795 000020C2 56                      		push	si
  7796 000020C3 53                      		push	bx
  7797 000020C4 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7798                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7799 000020C8 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7800 000020CB 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7801                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7802 000020CD 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7803 000020CF EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7804                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7805                                  
  7806                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7807                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7808 000020D1 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7809                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7810 000020D3 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7811                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7812 000020D6 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7813                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7814 000020DA 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7815                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7816                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7817 000020DD 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7818 000020E0 8B36[0C16]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7819 000020E4 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7820 000020E6 8306[0C16]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7821 000020EB FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7822 000020EF 8306[0E16]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7823 000020F4 5B                      		pop	bx
  7824 000020F5 5E                      		pop	si
  7825 000020F6 C3                      		retn
  7826                                  
  7827                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7828                                  
  7829                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7830                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7831                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0

  7834                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7835 000020F7 50                      		push	ax
  7836 000020F8 51                      		push	cx
  7837 000020F9 52                      		push	dx
  7838 000020FA 55                      		push	bp
  7839 000020FB 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7840                                  loop_clock:				
  7841 000020FD 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7842 000020FF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7843 00002101 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7844 00002103 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7845                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7846                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7847                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7848 00002105 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7849 00002108 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7850 0000210A 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7851 0000210D 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7852 0000210F 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7853 00002112 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7854 00002114 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7855 00002115 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7856                                  delay:					
  7857 00002118 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7858 0000211A EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7859                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7860                                  
  7861                                  clock_present:				
  7862 0000211C 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7863 00002122 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7864                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7865                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7866 00002125 56                      		push	si
  7867 00002126 E8CCF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7868 00002129 FA                      		cli
  7869                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7870 0000212A 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7871 0000212E FB                      		sti
  7872 0000212F 5E                      		pop	si
  7873                                  
  7874                                  no_readdate:				
  7875 00002130 5D                      		pop	bp
  7876 00002131 5A                      		pop	dx
  7877 00002132 59                      		pop	cx
  7878 00002133 58                      		pop	ax
  7879 00002134 C3                      		retn
  7880                                  
  7881                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7882                                  
  7883                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7884                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7885                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7886                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7887                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7888                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7889                                  ;
  7890                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7891                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7892                                  ;
  7893                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7894                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7895                                  ;
  7896                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7897                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7898                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7899                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7900                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7901                                  ;
  7902                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7903                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7904                                  
  7905                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7906                                  
  7907                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7908                                  
  7909                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7910                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7911                                  			
  7912 00002135 50                      		push	ax
  7913 00002136 2E803E[3606]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7914 0000213C 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7915 0000213E 2E803E[3706]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7916                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7917 00002144 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7918 00002146 2E803E[3706]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7919                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7920 0000214C 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7921                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7922                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7923                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7924                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7925                                  cmosck4:				
  7926 0000214E B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7927                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7928 00002150 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7929                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7930 00002152 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7931 00002155 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7932                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7933 00002157 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7934 0000215A 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7935                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7936 0000215C 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7937 0000215E B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7938                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7939 00002160 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7940                                  cmosck9:				
  7941 00002163 58                      		pop	ax
  7942 00002164 C3                      		retn
  7943                                  
  7944                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7945                                  
  7946                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7947                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7948                                  ;									       :
  7949                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7950                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7951                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7952                                  ;									       :
  7953                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7954                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7955                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7956                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7957                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7958                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7959                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7960                                  
  7961                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7962 00002165 9C                      		pushf
  7963 00002166 FA                      		cli
  7964 00002167 53                      		push	bx
  7965 00002168 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7966 00002169 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7967 0000216B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7968                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7969 0000216D 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7970 0000216E E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7971 00002170 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7972 00002172 58                      		pop	ax
  7973 00002173 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7974 00002175 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7975 00002177 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7976                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7977 00002179 90                      		nop
  7978 0000217A E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7979 0000217C 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7980 0000217E 5B                      		pop	bx
  7981 0000217F 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7982 00002180 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7983 00002183 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7984                                  
  7985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7986                                  
  7987                                  cmos_popf:				
  7988 00002184 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7989                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7990                                  
  7991                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7992                                  
  7993                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7994                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7995                                  ;									       :
  7996                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7997                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7998                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7999                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  8000                                  ;									       :
  8001                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  8002                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  8003                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  8004                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  8005                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  8006                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  8007                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8008                                  
  8009                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  8010 00002185 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  8011 00002186 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  8012 00002187 FA                      		cli
  8013 00002188 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  8014 00002189 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  8015 0000218B E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8016                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8017 0000218D 90                      		nop
  8018 0000218E 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  8019 00002190 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8020 00002192 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  8021 00002193 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  8022 00002195 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  8023 00002197 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8024                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8025 00002199 90                      		nop
  8026 0000219A E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8027 0000219C 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  8028 0000219D 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  8029 0000219E E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  8030 000021A1 C3                      		retn
  8031                                  
  8032                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8033                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8034                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8035                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  8036                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8037                                  
  8038                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8039                                  ;
  8040                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  8041                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  8042                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  8043                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  8044                                  
  8045                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8046                                  
  8047                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  8048                                  ;
  8049                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  8050                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  8051                                  ;  es:di = load location
  8052                                  
  8053                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8054                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8055                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8056                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  8057                                  
  8058                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8059                                  getclus:				
  8060 000021A2 51                      		push	cx
  8061 000021A3 57                      		push	di
  8062 000021A4 2E890E[8A15]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  8063 000021A9 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  8064 000021AB 48                      		dec	ax
  8065 000021AC 48                      		dec	ax
  8066 000021AD F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  8067                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  8068                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  8069 000021AF 2E0306[8615]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  8070 000021B4 2E1316[8815]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  8071                                  unpack:					
  8072 000021B9 1E                      		push	ds
  8073 000021BA 50                      		push	ax
  8074 000021BB 53                      		push	bx
  8075 000021BC 2E8B36[8D15]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  8076 000021C1 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  8077 000021C3 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  8078 000021C5 2EF606[8C15]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  8079                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  8080 000021CB 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  8081 000021CD D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  8082                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  8083 000021CF 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  8084                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  8085 000021D1 52                      		push	dx
  8086 000021D2 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8087 000021D4 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8088 000021D7 5A                      		pop	dx
  8089 000021D8 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  8090 000021DA 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  8091                                  		; 25/06/2023
  8092                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  8093 000021DC 2EA2[9415]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  8094 000021E0 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  8095 000021E1 52                      		push	dx
  8096 000021E2 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8097 000021E4 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8098 000021E7 5A                      		pop	dx
  8099                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  8100 000021E8 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  8101 000021EB 2EA2[9515]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  8102 000021EF 2EA1[9415]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  8103                                  even_odd:				
  8104 000021F3 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  8105 000021F4 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  8106 000021F5 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  8107 000021F7 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  8108 000021F9 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  8109                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  8110 000021FB D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8111 000021FD D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8112 000021FF D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8113                                  havclus:				
  8114 00002201 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  8115 00002203 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  8116 00002207 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  8117                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8118                                  
  8119                                  unpack16:				
  8120 00002209 52                      		push	dx
  8121 0000220A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8122 0000220C D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  8123 0000220E 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8124 00002211 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8125 00002214 5A                      		pop	dx
  8126 00002215 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  8127                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  8128                                  unpackx:				
  8129 00002217 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  8130 00002218 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  8131 00002219 1F                      		pop	ds
  8132 0000221A 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  8133 0000221C 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  8134 0000221F 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  8135 00002221 2E010E[8A15]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  8136 00002226 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  8137                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8138                                  
  8139                                  getcl2:					
  8140 00002228 53                      		push	bx
  8141 00002229 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  8142 0000222A 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  8143 0000222B 2EA1[8415]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  8144 0000222F 2E8B0E[8A15]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  8145 00002234 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  8146 00002235 2E8F06[2305]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  8147                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  8148 0000223A 1E                      		push	ds
  8149 0000223B 0E                      		push	cs
  8150 0000223C 1F                      		pop	ds
  8151 0000223D 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8152                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8153 0000223E BD[5E09]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8154                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8155                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8156 00002241 E8DBF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  8157 00002244 1F                      		pop	ds
  8158 00002245 5B                      		pop	bx
  8159 00002246 5F                      		pop	di
  8160 00002247 2EA1[8A15]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  8161 0000224B 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  8162 0000224D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  8163 0000224F 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  8164 00002251 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  8165 00002252 C3                      		retn
  8166                                  
  8167                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8168                                  
  8169                                  
  8170                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  8171                                  ;
  8172                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  8173                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  8174                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  8175                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  8176                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  8177                                  ;
  8178                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  8179                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  8180                                  ;      other registera saved.
  8181                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  8182                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  8183                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  8184                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  8185                                  
  8186                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8187                                  get_fat_sector:	
  8188 00002253 50                      		push	ax
  8189 00002254 51                      		push	cx
  8190 00002255 57                      		push	di
  8191 00002256 56                      		push	si
  8192 00002257 06                      		push	es
  8193 00002258 1E                      		push	ds
  8194 00002259 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  8195 0000225B 2E8B0E[9215]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8196 00002260 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  8197 00002262 90                      		nop
  8198                                  
  8199                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  8200                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  8201                                  
  8202 00002263 06                      		push	es
  8203 00002264 1E                      		push	ds
  8204 00002265 57                      		push	di
  8205 00002266 50                      		push	ax
  8206 00002267 0E                      		push	cs
  8207 00002268 1F                      		pop	ds
  8208                                  
  8209 00002269 2EA1[8415]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8210 0000226D BD[6D05]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8211                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8212                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8213 00002270 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8214 00002271 E8ABF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8215 00002274 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8216 00002275 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8217                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8218 00002279 5F                      		pop	di
  8219 0000227A 1F                      		pop	ds
  8220 0000227B 07                      		pop	es
  8221 0000227C 2E3B06[9615]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8222 00002281 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8223 00002283 2EA3[9615]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  8224                                  					; sector number
  8225                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8226 00002287 52                      		push	dx
  8227 00002288 2EC706[2305]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8228                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8229                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8230 0000228F 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8231 00002291 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8232 00002294 2EA1[8415]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8233 00002298 1E                      		push	ds
  8234 00002299 07                      		pop	es
  8235 0000229A 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8236 0000229C 1E                      		push	ds
  8237 0000229D 0E                      		push	cs
  8238 0000229E 1F                      		pop	ds
  8239 0000229F 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8240 000022A0 BD[5E09]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8241                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8242                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8243 000022A3 E879F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8244 000022A6 1F                      		pop	ds
  8245 000022A7 5A                      		pop	dx
  8246 000022A8 2E8B0E[9215]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8247                                  
  8248                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  8249 000022AD 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8250 000022AE 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8251                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8252                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8253 000022B0 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8254 000022B2 1F                      		pop	ds
  8255 000022B3 07                      		pop	es
  8256 000022B4 5E                      		pop	si
  8257 000022B5 5F                      		pop	di
  8258 000022B6 59                      		pop	cx
  8259 000022B7 58                      		pop	ax
  8260 000022B8 C3                      		retn
  8261                                  
  8262                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8263                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8264                                  
  8265                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8266                                  
  8267                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8268                                  		;db 0
  8269                                  
  8270                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  8271                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8272                                  
  8273                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  8274 000022B9 00<rep 7h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8275                                  %endif
  8276                                  
  8277                                  ;align 16
  8278                                  
  8279                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8280                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8281                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8282                                  
  8283                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  8284                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8285                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  8286                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  8287                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  8288                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8289                                  
  8290                                  ;============================================================================
  8291                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  8292                                  ;============================================================================
  8293                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8294                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  8295                                  
  8296                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  8297                                  
  8298                                  ; 30/12/2022
  8299                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  8300                                  
  8301                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8302                                   
  8303                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8304                                  
  8305                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8306                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8307                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8308                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8309                                  
  8310                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8311 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8312 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8313                                  
  8314                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8315                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8316                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8317                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8318                                  
  8319                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8320                                  
  8321                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8322                                  
  8323                                  ;************************************************************************
  8324                                  ;*									*
  8325                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8326                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8327                                  ;*									*
  8328                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8329                                  ;*									*
  8330                                  ;************************************************************************
  8331                                  
  8332                                  	; 20/09/2023	
  8333                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8334                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8335                                  
  8336                                  _seg_reinit:
  8337 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8338                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8339                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8340 00000037 BF[BF06]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8341                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8342                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8343                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8344 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8345                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8346 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8347 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8348 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8349 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8350                                  
  8351                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8352                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8353                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8354                                  		
  8355                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8356 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov	[es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8357                                  		
  8358 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8359                                  
  8360                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8361                                  
  8362                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8363                                  
  8364                                  ;************************************************************************
  8365                                  ;*									*
  8366                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8367                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8368                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8369                                  ;*									*
  8370                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8371                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8372                                  ;*									*
  8373                                  ;************************************************************************
  8374                                  
  8375                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8376 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8377 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8378 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8379 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8380 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8381 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8382 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8383 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8384 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8385 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8386 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8387                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8388                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8389 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8390                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
  8391 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
  8392                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8393 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  8394 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8395 00000061 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8396                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8397 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8398 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8399 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8400 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8401 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8402                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8403 00000079 81FE[3805]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8404                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  8405                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8406                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8407 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8408                                  
  8409                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8410                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8411                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8412                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8413                                  ;
  8414                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8415                                  ;
  8416                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8417                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8418                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8419                                  ;
  8420                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8421                                  
  8422                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8423                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8424 0000007F C706[2305]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8425 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8426 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8427 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8428                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8429                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8430 0000008E 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8431 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8432                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8433                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8434 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8435 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8436 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
  8437 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
  8438 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8439 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8440 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8441 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8442 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8443 000000AA FC                      		cld
  8444                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8445 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8446                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8447 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8448 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8449                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8450                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
  8451                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8452                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8453 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8454                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8455 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8456 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8457                                  					; mark operation complete
  8458 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
  8459 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
  8460 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8461 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
  8462 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
  8463 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
  8464 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
  8465 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
  8466 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
  8467                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8468                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
  8469 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
  8470 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
  8471                                  
  8472                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8473                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8474                                  bc_retf:
  8475 000000CA CB                      		retf
  8476                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8477                                  
  8478                                  command_error:				
  8479 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8480 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8481                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8482                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8483                                  
  8484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8485                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8486                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8487                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8488                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8489                                  ; high.
  8490                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8491                                  
  8492                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8493                                  
  8494                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
  8495                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
  8496                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8497                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8498                                  
  8499 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8500                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8501                                  		
  8502                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8503                                  
  8504                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8505                                  
  8506                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8507 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8508                                  					; unknown command error
  8509                                  
  8510                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8511                                  
  8512                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8513                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8514                                  
  8515                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8516                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8517                                  
  8518                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8519                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8520                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8521 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8522 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8523                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8524 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8525 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8526 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8527                                  
  8528                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8529                                  
  8530                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8531
