 11559                                  disk_not_mini:				
 11560 00000B23 D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 11561 00000B25 D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 11562 00000B27 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 11563 00000B2B 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 11564 00000B2D 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 11565 00000B2F 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 11566 00000B33 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 11567                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11568 00000B37 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 11569 00000B3C 7413                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 11570                                  
 11571                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 11572                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 11573                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 11574                                  
 11575 00000B3E 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 11576 00000B43 740A                    		jz	short do_writej
 11577 00000B45 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 11578 00000B48 7407                    		jz	short do_fast
 11579 00000B4A 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 11580 00000B4D 7402                    		jz	short do_fast
 11581                                  do_writej:	
 11582                                  
 11583                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 11584                                  			
 11585 00000B4F EB56                    		jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 11586                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11587                                  
 11588                                  do_fast:				
 11589 00000B51 E8FC00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 11590                                  
 11591                                  testerr:				
 11592 00000B54 7295                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 11593                                  
 11594                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 11595                                  
 11596 00000B56 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 11597 00000B5A 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11598                                  no_set:
 11599                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 11600 00000B5E 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 11601 00000B64 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 11602                                  noverify:				
 11603 00000B66 58                      		pop	ax
 11604                                  
 11605                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 11606                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 11607                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 11608                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 11609                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 11610                                  
 11611 00000B67 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11612                                  					; fnon_removable
 11613 00000B6C 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 11614 00000B6E F606[2705]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 11615 00000B73 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 11616                                  its_removable:				
 11617 00000B75 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 11618 00000B78 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11619 00000B7A 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 11620 00000B7E 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 11621 00000B80 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 11622 00000B84 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11623                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 11624 00000B88 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 11625 00000B8A C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 11626 00000B8F 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 11627 00000B93 FEC6                    		inc	dh
 11628 00000B95 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 11629 00000B99 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 11630 00000B9B 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11631 00000B9D FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 11632                                  noxor:					
 11633 00000BA1 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 11634                                  disk_ret:				
 11635 00000BA5 F8                      		clc
 11636 00000BA6 C3                      		retn
 11637                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11638                                  
 11639                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11640                                  
 11641                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11642                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11643                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11644                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11645                                  
 11646                                  do_write:				
 11647 00000BA7 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11648 00000BAB 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11649 00000BAD 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11650 00000BB1 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11651                                  
 11652                                  do_norm:				
 11653 00000BB3 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11654 00000BB6 EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11655                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11656                                  
 11657                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11658                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11659                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11660                                  
 11661                                  doverify:				
 11662 00000BB8 58                      		pop	ax
 11663 00000BB9 50                      		push	ax
 11664 00000BBA B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11665 00000BBC E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 11666 00000BBF 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11667                                  
 11668                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11669                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11670                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11671                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11672                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11673                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11674                                  
 11675 00000BC1 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11676 00000BC4 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11677 00000BC6 FF0E[2C05]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11678 00000BCA 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11679 00000BCC E83705                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11680 00000BCF EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11681                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11682                                  
 11683                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 11684 00000BD1 E83205                  		call	ResetDisk
 11685 00000BD4 FF0E[2A05]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11686 00000BD8 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11687                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11688                                  
 11689                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11690                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11691                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11692                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11693                                  
 11694                                  dskerr:					
 11695 00000BDA 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11696 00000BDF 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11697 00000BE1 E80B0D                  		call	checkio
 11698                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11699 00000BE4 803E[2E05]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11700 00000BE9 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11701 00000BEB BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11702 00000BEE C606[2E05]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11703                                  dochkagain:				
 11704 00000BF3 E8AA00                  		call	again
 11705                                  dskerr0:				
 11706 00000BF6 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11707 00000BF8 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11708                                  					; fnon_removable
 11709 00000BFD 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11710 00000BFF 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11711 00000C02 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11712                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11713 00000C04 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11714 00000C07 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11715 00000C09 C706[2C05]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11716                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11717                                  dskerr1:				
 11718 00000C0F 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11719                                  		;jmp	retry
 11720                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11721 00000C10 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11722                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11723                                  
 11724                                  write_fault_err:			
 11725 00000C13 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11726                                  					; for write fault error.
 11727 00000C16 EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11728                                  
 11729                                  		; fall into harderr
 11730                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11731                                  
 11732                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11733                                  
 11734                                  harderr:				
 11735 00000C18 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11736                                  harderr2:				
 11737 00000C1B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11738                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11739 00000C20 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11740 00000C24 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11741                                  
 11742                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11743                                  
 11744                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11745                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11746 00000C28 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11747                                  
 11748                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11749                                  
 11750                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11751                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11752                                  
 11753                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11754                                  normspeed:
 11755 00000C2B 803E[3006]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11756 00000C30 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11757 00000C32 06                      		push	es
 11758 00000C33 50                      		push	ax
 11759 00000C34 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11760 00000C37 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11761 00000C3B 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11762 00000C3F 58                      		pop	ax
 11763 00000C40 07                      		pop	es
 11764 00000C41 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11765 00000C44 06                      		push	es
 11766 00000C45 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11767 00000C49 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11768                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11769 00000C4E 07                      		pop	es
 11770 00000C4F C3                      		retn
 11771                                  
 11772                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11773                                  
 11774                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11775                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11776                                  
 11777                                  fastspeed:		
 11778 00000C50 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11779                                  					; ftoobig
 11780 00000C55 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11781 00000C57 06                      		push	es
 11782 00000C58 8E06[2F05]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11783 00000C5C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11784 00000C5E 8C06[2F05]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11785 00000C62 07                      		pop	es
 11786 00000C63 C3                      		retn
 11787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11788                                  
 11789                                  notready:				
 11790 00000C64 F9                      		stc
 11791 00000C65 B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11792 00000C67 C3                      		retn
 11793                                  
 11794                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11795                                  
 11796                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11797                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11798                                  
 11799                                  maperror:	
 11800 00000C68 51                      		push	cx
 11801 00000C69 06                      		push	es
 11802 00000C6A 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11803 00000C6B 07                      		pop	es
 11804 00000C6C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11805 00000C6E A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11806                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11807 00000C71 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11808                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11809 00000C74 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11810 00000C77 F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11811                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11812                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11813                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11814 00000C79 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11815                                  					; get translation
 11816                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11817                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11818 00000C7C 07                      		pop	es
 11819 00000C7D 59                      		pop	cx
 11820 00000C7E F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11821 00000C7F C3                      		retn
 11822                                  
 11823                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11824                                  
 11825                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11826                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11827                                  
 11828                                  set_tim:		
 11829 00000C80 50                      		push	ax
 11830 00000C81 E898F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11831                                  
 11832                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11833                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11834                                  
 11835 00000C84 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11836 00000C88 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11837 00000C8A 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11838                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11839                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11840 00000C8E 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11841                                  setaccess:				
 11842 00000C90 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11843 00000C95 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11844 00000C99 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11845                                  done_set:				
 11846 00000C9D F8                      		clc
 11847                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11848 00000C9E 58                      		pop	ax
 11849 00000C9F C3                      		retn
 11850                                  
 11851                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11852                                  
 11853                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11854                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11855                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11856                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11857                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11858                                  
 11859                                  again:	
 11860 00000CA0 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11861 00000CA3 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11862 00000CA6 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11863                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11864 00000CA8 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11865 00000CA9 C3                      		retn
 11866                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11867                                  
 11868                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11869 00000CAA 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11870 00000CAC C3                      		retn
 11871

 11884                                  ;
 11885                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11886                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11887                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11888                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11889                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11890                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -

 11976                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11977                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11978                                  ;
 11979                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11980                                  ;
 11981                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11982                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11983                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11984                                  ;
 11985                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11986                                  
 11987                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11988                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11989                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11990 00000CDD E88DF8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11991 00000CE0 06                      		push	es
 11992 00000CE1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11993 00000CE5 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11994                                  					; RAWIO
 11995 00000CEA 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11996 00000CEE 07                      		pop	es
 11997 00000CEF 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11998                                  
 11999                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 12000                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 12001                                  
 12002                                  		; 10/12/2022

 12273                                  
 12274                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12275                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12276                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12277                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12278                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12279                                  ;
 12280                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12281                                  ;
 12282                                  ; output:
 12283                                  ;	for status call:
 12284                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12285                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12286                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12287                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12288                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12289                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12290                                  ;
 12291                                  ;	for format track:
 12292                                  ;		carry set if error
 12293                                  ;
 12294                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12295                                  
 12296                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12297                                  
 12298                                  		; 19/10/2022

 12448                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12449                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12450                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12451                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12452                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12453                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12454                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12455                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12456                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 12457                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 12458                                  		; register.

 12460                                  					; Special function requested?

 12563                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12564                                  
 12565                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12566                                  ;
 12567                                  ; TrackIo:
 12568                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12569                                  ;
 12570                                  ;   input:
 12571                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12572                                  ;		  3 = write
 12573                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12574                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12575                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12576                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12577                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12578                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12579                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12580                                  ;
 12581                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12582                                  
 12583                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12584                                  		
 12585                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12586                                  TrackIo:	
 12587                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12588 00000F8F 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error

 12593 00000F9D 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12594 00000F9E 51                      		push	cx
 12595 00000F9F E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 12596 00000FA2 59                      		pop	cx
 12597 00000FA3 58                      		pop	ax
 12598                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the

 12600 00000FA7 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12601 00000FA9 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12602 00000FAB 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12603                                  
 12604                                  		; WE WANT:
 12605                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12606                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12607                                  		
 12608 00000FAD BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12609                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12610 00000FB0 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8

 12612                                  					; good_tracklayout

 12616                                  ionextsector:

 12618 00000FBA 52                      		push	dx
 12619 00000FBB 46                      		inc	si

 12621                                  					; the track table

 12625                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12626                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12627                                  		;     only CL is valid.

 12629                                  		; 3). Good track layout

 12639                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?

 12641 00000FCF 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12642 00000FD3 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12643 00000FD5 E816FB                  		call	Disk
 12644 00000FD8 5A                      		pop	dx
 12645 00000FD9 59                      		pop	cx
 12646 00000FDA F8                      		clc
 12647 00000FDB C3                      		retn
 12648                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12649                                  
 12650                                  IoRemovable:

 12652                                  					; table	and save it

 12662 00000FEF 58                      		pop	ax
 12663 00000FF0 1F                      		pop	ds

 12668                                  					; sector size

 12686                                  					; entries in Dpt.

 12692                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12693                                  
 12694                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12695                                  ;
 12696                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12697                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12698                                  ; are permissible.
 12699                                  ;
 12700                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12701                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12702                                  ; All other registers preserved
 12703                                  ;
 12704                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12733                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12734                                  ;
 12735                                  ; SetDASD
 12736                                  ;
 12737                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12738                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12739                                  ;
 12740                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12741                                  ;
 12742                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12743                                  
 12744                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12745                                  SetDasd:
 12746 00001014 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12747                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12748 00001019 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12749                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12750 0000101B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12751                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12752                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12753 00001020 7447                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12754                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12755 00001022 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12756                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12757                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12758                                  DoSetDasd:
 12759 00001027 C606[3106]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12760 0000102C C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12761 00001031 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12762                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12763 00001033 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12764 00001037 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12765                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12766                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12767 0000103A 7415                    		jz	short DoSet
 12768 0000103C 80FC01                  		cmp	ah, 1
 12769                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12770                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12771                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 12772 0000103F B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12773                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12774                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12775 00001041 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12776                                  
 12777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12778                                  
 12779                                  GotBig:
 12780                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12781                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12782 00001043 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 12783 00001044 803E[2F06]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12784 00001049 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12785                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12786                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12787                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12788                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12789 0000104B 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 12790 0000104C C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 12791                                  DoSet:
 12792 00001051 1E                      		push	ds
 12793 00001052 56                      		push	si
 12794                                  
 12795                                  		;mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 12796                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12797 00001053 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12798 00001055 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si	; 0
 12799                                  
 12800 00001057 C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12801                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12802                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12803                                  
 12804 0000105B C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12805                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12806 0000105F 5E                      		pop	si
 12807 00001060 1F                      		pop	ds
 12808 00001061 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12809 00001063 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12810 00001067 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12811                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12812                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12813 00001069 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12814 0000106D 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12815 00001071 C3                      		retn
 12816                                  
 12817                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12818                                  
 12819                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12820                                  
 12821                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12822                                  ;
 12823                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12824                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12825                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12826                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12827                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12828                                  ;
 12829                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12830                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12831                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12832                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12833                                  ;
 12834                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12835                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12836                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12837                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12838                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12839                                  ;
 12840                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12841                                  
 12842                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12843                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12844 00001072 51                      		push	cx
 12845 00001073 52                      		push	dx
 12846                                  
 12847                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12848                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12849                                  
 12850 00001074 803E[3106]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12851 00001079 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12852 0000107B 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12853 0000107D 803E[3006]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12854 00001082 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat

 12979                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12981                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12982                                  ;
 12983                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12984                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12985                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12986                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12987                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 13017                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13018                                  ;
 13019                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13020                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13021                                  ;
 13022                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13023                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13024                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13025                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13026                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13027                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13028                                  ;
 13029                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13030                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13031                                  ;
 13032                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13033

 13087                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13088                                  
 13089                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13090                                  
 13091                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13092                                  ;
 13093                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13094                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13095                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13096                                  ;
 13097                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13098                                  
 13099                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13100                                  ioctl_getown:
 13101 00001174 E8F6F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13102 00001177 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13103                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13104 0000117B C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13105                                  ownloop:				
 13106 0000117F 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13107 00001183 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13108                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13109 00001185 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13110                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13111                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13112 0000118A 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13113                                  getnextBDS:				
 13114 0000118C 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13115 0000118F EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13116                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13117                                  
 13118                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13119                                  ;
 13120                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13121                                  ; in al to al.
 13122                                  ;
 13123                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13124                                  
 13125                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13126                                  ioctl_setown:
 13127 00001191 E8D9F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13128 00001194 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13129                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13130 00001199 E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 13131                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13132 0000119C FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13133                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13134                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13135                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13136                                  
 13137                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13138                                  ;
 13139                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13140                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13141                                  ;
 13142                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13143                                  
 13144                                  exitown:				
 13145 000011A0 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13146                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13147 000011A2 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13148                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13149                                  					; fi_am_mult
 13150 000011A7 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 13151 000011A9 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13152                                  					; Get logical drive number
 13153                                  					; Get it 1-based
 13154 000011AD FEC1                    		inc	cl
 13155                                  exitnomult:				
 13156 000011AF C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 13157 000011B3 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 13158                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13159                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13160                                  		; cf=0
 13161                                  		;clc
 13162 000011B6 C3                      		retn

 13171                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.

 13214                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13215                                  
 13216                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13217                                  ;	get media id
 13218                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13219                                  ;
 13220                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13221                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13222                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13223                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13224                                  ;
 13225                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13226                                  ;
 13227                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13228                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13229                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13230                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13231                                  ;
 13232                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13233                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13234                                  ;
 13235                                  ; LOGIC:
 13236                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13237                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13238                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13239                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13240                                  ;
 13241                                  ; {
 13242                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13243                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13244                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13245                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13246                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13247                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13248                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13249                                  ;		};
 13250                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13251                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13252                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13253                                  ;		};
 13254                                  ;	else
 13255                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13256                                  ;
 13257                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13258                                  
 13259                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13260                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13261                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13262                                  
 13263                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13264                                  GetMediaId:
 13265 000011E5 E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13266 000011E8 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13267 000011EC C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13268 000011F1 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13269 000011F4 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13270                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13271 000011F6 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13272                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13273 000011FB 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13274                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13275 000011FD BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13276 00001200 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13277                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13278                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13279 00001203 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13280 00001205 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13281 00001209 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13282                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13283 0000120D 46                      		inc	si
 13284                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13285                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13286 0000120E 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13287 00001211 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13288                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13289                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13290 00001214 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13291                                  	
 13292                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13293                                  		; cf = 0
 13294                                  		;clc
 13295                                  
 13296 00001216 C3                      		retn
 13297                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13298                                  
 13299                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 13300 00001217 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13301 00001219 F9                      		stc
 13302                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 13303 0000121A C3                      		retn
 13304                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13305

 13307                                  
 13308                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13309                                  ;  set media id
 13310                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13311                                  
 13312                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13313                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13314                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13315                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13316                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13317                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13318                                  ;
 13319                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13320                                  ;
 13321                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13322                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13323                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13324                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13325                                  ;
 13326                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13327                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13328                                  ;
 13329                                  ; logic:
 13330                                  ;
 13331                                  ; {
 13332                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13333                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13334                                  ;	BootIo;
 13335                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13336                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13337                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13338                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13339                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13340                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13341                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13342                                  ;		};
 13343                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13344                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13345                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13346                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13347                                  ;		};
 13348                                  ;	else
 13349                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13350                                  ;
 13351                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13352                                  
 13353                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13354                                  SetMediaId:
 13355 0000121B E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13356 0000121E 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13357                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13358 00001222 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13359 00001224 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13360 00001229 52                      		push	dx
 13361 0000122A E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13362 0000122D 5A                      		pop	dx
 13363 0000122E 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13364                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13365 00001230 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13366                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13367 00001235 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13368 00001237 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13369                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13370 0000123C 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13371 0000123E 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13372 0000123F 57                      		push	di
 13373 00001240 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13374 00001241 07                      		pop	es
 13375 00001242 BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13376 00001245 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13377 00001249 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13378 0000124C 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13379 0000124F B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13380                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13381                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13382 00001252 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 13383 00001254 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13384 00001255 1F                      		pop	ds
 13385 00001256 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13386 00001257 07                      		pop	es
 13387 00001258 E876F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13388 0000125B 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13389 0000125D C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13390 00001262 E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13391 00001265 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13392                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13393                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13394 0000126A C3                      		retn
 13395                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13396                                  
 13397                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 13398 0000126B B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13399 0000126D F9                      		stc
 13400                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 13401 0000126E C3                      		retn
 13402                                  
 13403                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13404                                  
 13405                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13406                                  
 13407                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13408                                  ;	BootIo
 13409                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13410                                  ;
 13411                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13412                                  ;
 13413                                  ; input :
 13414                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13415                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13416                                  ;
 13417                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13418                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13419                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13420                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13421                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13422                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13423                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13424                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13425                                  ;
 13426                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13427                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13428                                  ;
 13429                                  ; logic:
 13430                                  ;
 13431                                  ; {
 13432                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13433                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13434                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13435                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13436                                  ; }
 13437                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13438                                  
 13439                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13440                                  BootIo:	
 13441 0000126F 06                      		push	es
 13442 00001270 57                      		push	di
 13443 00001271 53                      		push	bx
 13444 00001272 1E                      		push	ds
 13445 00001273 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13446                                  
 13447                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13448                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13449                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13450                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13451                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13452                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13453                                  
 13454 00001274 BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13455 00001277 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13456 00001279 8916[2305]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13457 0000127D B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13458 00001280 E8E0F6                  		call	diskio
 13459 00001283 5B                      		pop	bx
 13460 00001284 5F                      		pop	di
 13461 00001285 07                      		pop	es
 13462 00001286 C3                      		retn
 13463                                  
 13464                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13465                                  
 13466                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13467                                  
 13468                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13469                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13470                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13471                                  ;
 13472                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13473                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13474                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13475                                  ; history in the flags.
 13476                                  ;
 13477                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13478                                  ;
 13479                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13480                                  ;
 13481                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13482                                  ;
 13483                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13484                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13485                                  ;
 13486                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13487                                  
 13488                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13489 00001287 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13490 0000128B 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13491 0000128D 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13492                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13493 0000128F 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13494                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13495                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13496 00001294 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13497 00001296 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13498 0000129B 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13499 0000129D E8EB06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13500 000012A0 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13501                                  
 13502                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13503                                  
 13504 000012A2 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13505 000012A4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13506                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13507                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13508 000012A6 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13509 000012A8 53                      		push	bx
 13510 000012A9 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13511                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13512                                  					; physical drive
 13513 000012AC E8B506                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13514 000012AF 5B                      		pop	bx
 13515                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13516 000012B0 C3                      		retn
 13517                                  
 13518                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13519

 13521                                  
 13522                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13523                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13524                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13525                                  ;
 13526                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13527                                  ;
 13528                                  ; INPUT :
 13529                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13530                                  ;
 13531                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13532                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13533                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13534                                  
 13535                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13536                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 13537 000012B1 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13538 000012B5 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13539                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13540                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13541 000012B8 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13542                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13543 000012BA 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13544                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13545                                  					; unformatted_media
 13546 000012BF 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13547 000012C1 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13548                                  
 13549                                  GafDone:				
 13550 000012C3 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13551 000012C6 C3                      		retn
 13552                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13553                                  
 13554                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13555                                  
 13556                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13557                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13558                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13559                                  ;
 13560                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13561                                  ;
 13562                                  ; input :
 13563                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13564                                  ;
 13565                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13566                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13567                                  
 13568                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13569                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13570 000012C7 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13571 000012CB C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13572                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13573 000012CE 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13574                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13575                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13576 000012D3 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13577 000012D7 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13578                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13579 000012D9 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13580                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13581                                  					; unformatted_media
 13582                                  saf_Done:				
 13583 000012DE C3                      		retn
 13584                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13585

 13588                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13589                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13590                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13591                                  ;
 13592                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13593                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13594                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13595                                  ;
 13596                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13597                                  
 13598                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13599                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13600 000012DF 06                      		push	es
 13601 000012E0 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13602 000012E4 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13603                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13604                                  
 13605                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13606                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13607                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13608                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13609                                  
 13610 000012E8 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13611                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13612 000012EA 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13613                                  ioctl_support:
 13614 000012EC 0E                      		push	cs
 13615 000012ED 07                      		pop	es
 13616                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13617                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13618 000012EE B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13619                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13620 000012F1 BF[D20C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13621                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13622                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13623 000012F4 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13624 000012F6 F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13625 000012F8 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13626 000012FA B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13627                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13628                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13629                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13630                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13631                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13632                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13633                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13634 000012FD 07                      		pop	es
 13635                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13636                                  		; cf = 0
 13637                                  		;clc
 13638 000012FE C3                      		retn
 13639                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13640                                  nosupport:
 13641 000012FF 07                      		pop	es
 13642 00001300 E9D2ED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
