 15105                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15106                                  
 15107                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15108                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15109                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15110                                  ;
 15111                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15112                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15113                                  
 15114                                  mediacheck:	
 15115 00001836 E89CF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15116 00001839 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15117 0000183B E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15118 0000183E 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15119 00001840 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15120 00001843 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15121 00001845 50                      		push	ax
 15122 00001846 52                      		push	dx
 15123 00001847 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15124                                  					; set logical drive number
 15125 0000184B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15126 0000184D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15127                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15128                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15129 0000184F 5A                      		pop	dx
 15130 00001850 58                      		pop	ax
 15131 00001851 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15132 00001853 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15133                                  
 15134                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15135                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15136                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15137                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15138                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15139                                  ; status.
 15140                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15141 00001856 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15142 0000185A 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15143                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15144                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15145                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15146                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15147 0000185E 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15148                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15149                                  
 15150                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15151                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15152                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15153                                  
 15154 00001860 50                      		push	ax
 15155 00001861 51                      		push	cx
 15156 00001862 52                      		push	dx
 15157 00001863 E88DED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15158 00001866 5A                      		pop	dx
 15159 00001867 59                      		pop	cx
 15160 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 15161 00001869 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15162 0000186B 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15163                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15164 0000186D 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15165                                  mediaret:				
 15166 0000186F C3                      		retn
 15167                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15168                                  
 15169                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15170                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15171                                  ; or write.
 15172                                  
 15173                                  mediadovolid:				
 15174 00001870 E820EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15175 00001873 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15176 00001875 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15177 00001878 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15178 0000187A E9EBF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15179                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15180                                  
 15181                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15182                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15183                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15184                                  ; dos.
 15185                                  ;
 15186                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15187                                  
 15188                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15189                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15190                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15191                                  
 15192                                  checklatchio:	
 15193                                  
 15194                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15195                                  			
 15196 0000187D E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15197 00001880 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15198                                  
 15199                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15200                                  
 15201 00001882 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15202 00001885 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15203                                  
 15204                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15205                                  ; expensive verification.
 15206                                  
 15207 00001887 E809EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15208 0000188A 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15209 0000188C E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15210 0000188F 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15211 00001891 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15212 00001893 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15213 00001895 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15214                                  checklatchret:				
 15215 00001898 E8CDF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15216                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15217 0000189B F9                      		stc
 15218 0000189C 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15219                                  checkret:				
 15220 0000189D C3                      		retn
 15221                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15222                                  
 15223                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15224                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15225                                  ;
 15226                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15227                                  
 15228                                  checkfatvid:				
 15229 0000189E E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15230 000018A1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15231 000018A3 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15232                                  
 15233                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15234                                  
 15235                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15236                                  
 15237                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15238                                  
 15239                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15240                                  ;
 15241                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15242                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15243                                  ;
 15244                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15245                                  ;
 15246                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15247                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15248                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15249                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15250                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15251                                  ;
 15252                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15253                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15254                                  ; routine.)
 15255                                  ;
 15256                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15257                                  
 15258                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15259                                  check_vid:
 15260                                  
 15261                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15262                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15263                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15264                                  
 15265 000018A5 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15266                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15267                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15268 000018AA 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15269 000018AC E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15270 000018AF 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15271 000018B1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15272 000018B3 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15273                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15274 000018B8 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15275                                  					; if not fat system
 15276 000018BA E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15277 000018BD 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15278 000018BF E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15279 000018C2 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15280                                  					; definitely changed
 15281 000018C5 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15282                                  
 15283 000018C7 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15284                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15285 000018C8 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15286                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15287                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15288                                  		;clc
 15289                                  checkfatret:				
 15290 000018CB C3                      		retn
 15291                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15292                                  
 15293                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15294                                  changed_drv:
 15295 000018CC F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15296 000018CD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15297                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15298 000018D2 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15299                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15300                                  
 15301                                  ; extended id check
 15302                                  
 15303                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15304                                  
 15305                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15306                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15307                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15308                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15309                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15310                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15311                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15312                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15313                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15314                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15315                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15316                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15317                                  ;
 15318                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15319                                  
 15320                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15321                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15322 000018D3 50                      		push	ax
 15323                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15324                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15325 000018D4 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15326                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15327 000018D7 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15328 000018D9 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15329 000018DD 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15330 000018DF A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15331 000018E2 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15332 000018E6 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15333                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15334                                  					; don't know
 15335 000018E8 58                      		pop	ax
 15336 000018E9 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15337                                  					; reset the flag
 15338                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15339                                  
 15340                                  ext_changed:
 15341 000018EB 58                      		pop	ax
 15342                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15343 000018EC 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15344                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15345                                  					; disk changed!
 15346                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15347                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15348                                  		;clc
 15349 000018ED EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15350                                  
 15351                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15352                                  
 15353                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15354                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15355                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15356                                  ;
 15357                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15358                                  
 15359                                  checkio:				
 15360 000018EF 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15361 000018F2 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15362 000018F4 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15363 000018F7 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15364 000018F9 E897ED                  		call	GetBp
 15365 000018FC 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15366 000018FE E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15367 00001901 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15368 00001903 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15369 00001905 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15370 00001907 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15371 00001908 C3                      		retn
 15372                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15373                                  
 15374                                  checkioerr:				
 15375 00001909 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15376                                  
 15377                                  checkioret:				
 15378 0000190C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15379 0000190D E908F3                  		jmp	harderr
 15380                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15381                                  
 15382                                  no_error_map:				
 15383 00001910 E908F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15384                                  
 15385                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15386                                  
 15387                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15388                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15389                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15390                                  
 15391                                  returnvid:		
 15392 00001913 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15393                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15394 00001916 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15395 00001919 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15396 0000191B F9                      		stc
 15397 0000191C C3                      		retn
 15398                                  
 15399                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15400                                  
 15401                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15402                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15403                                  ;
 15404                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15405                                  ; **trashes si**
 15406                                  
 15407                                  media_set_vid:				
 15408 0000191D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15409                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15410                                  
 15411                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15412                                  
 15413                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15414                                  
 15415                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15416                                  
 15417                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15418                                  vid_into_packet:
 15419 00001920 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15420 00001921 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15421 00001925 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15422 00001928 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15423 0000192A 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15424 0000192D 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15425 00001930 1F                      		pop	ds
 15426                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15427 00001931 C3                      		retn
 15428                                  
 15429                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15430                                  
 15431                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15432                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15433                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15434                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15435                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15436                                  ;
 15437                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15438                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15439                                  ;
 15440                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15441                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15442                                  ;		carry set
 15443                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15444                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15445                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15446                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15447                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15448                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15449                                  ;
 15450                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15451                                  
 15452                                  hidensity:
 15453                                  
 15454                                  ; check for correct drive
 15455                                  		
 15456                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15457 00001932 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15458                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15459                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15460 00001937 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15461                                  
 15462                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15463                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15464                                  
 15465 00001939 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15466 0000193E 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15467                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15468                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15469 00001940 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15470 00001943 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15471                                  
 15472                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15473                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15474                                  
 15475                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15476 00001945 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15477 00001949 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15478                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15479                                  					; ffOther
 15480 0000194B 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15481 0000194D 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15482                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15483                                  					; ff288
 15484 0000194F 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15485 00001951 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15486 00001953 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15487                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15488                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15489 00001956 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15490                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15491                                  					; 2 sides
 15492                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15493 00001959 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15494 0000195A BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15495                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15496                                  					; & head max
 15497                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15498 0000195D E9A5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15499                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15500                                  
 15501                                  Is720K:
 15502                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15503 00001960 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15504                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15505 00001961 E968ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15506                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15507                                  
 15508                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15509                                  ;dofloppy:
 15510                                  		;retn
 15511                                  
 15512                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15513                                  
 15514                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15515                                  
 15516                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15517                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15518                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15519                                  ;
 15520                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15521                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15522                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15523                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15524                                  ;
 15525                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15526                                  ;
 15527                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15528                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15529                                  
 15530                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15531 00001964 06                      		push	es
 15532 00001965 57                      		push	di
 15533                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15534                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15535 00001966 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15536                                  
 15537                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15538                                  
 15539                                  scan_bds:				
 15540 0000196A 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15541 0000196E 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15542                                  
 15543                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15544                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15545                                  
 15546 00001970 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15547                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15548                                  get_next_bds:				
 15549 00001974 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15550                                  					; go to	next bds
 15551 00001977 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15552 0000197A 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15553 0000197C 5F                      		pop	di
 15554 0000197D 07                      		pop	es
 15555 0000197E C3                      		retn
 15556                                  
 15557                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15558                                  
 15559                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15560                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15561                                  ;
 15562                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15563                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15564                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15565                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15566                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15567                                  
 15568                                  checkromchange:	
 15569                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15570                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15571 0000197F 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15572                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15573                                  					; fchanged
 15574 00001984 C3                      		retn
 15575                                  
 15576                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15577                                  
 15578                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15579                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15580                                  ;
 15581                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15582                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15583                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15584                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15585                                  
 15586                                  resetchanged:	
 15587                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15588                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15589 00001985 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15590                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15591                                  					; ~fchanged
 15592 0000198A C3                      		retn
 15593                                  
 15594                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15595                                  
 15596                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15597                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15598                                  ;
 15599                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15600                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15601                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15602                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15603                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15604                                  
 15605                                  haschange:
 15606                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15607                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15608 0000198B 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15609                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15610                                  					; fchangeline
 15611 00001990 C3                      		retn
 15612                                  
 15613                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15614                                  
 15615                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15616                                  
 15617                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15618                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15619                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15620                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15621                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15622                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15623                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15624                                  
 15625                                  ; set_volume_id
 15626                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15627                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15628                                  ;
 15629                                  ;   on entry:
 15630                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15631                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15632                                  ;
 15633                                  ;   on exit:
 15634                                  ;	carry clear:
 15635                                  ;	   successful call
 15636                                  ;	carry set
 15637                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15638                                  
 15639                                  set_volume_id:				
 15640 00001991 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15641 00001992 50                      		push	ax
 15642 00001993 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15643 00001996 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15644 00001998 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15645 0000199B 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15646 0000199D E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15647 000019A0 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15648                                  setvret:				
 15649                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15650                                  		; cf = 0
 15651                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15652 000019A3 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15653 000019A4 5A                      		pop	dx
 15654 000019A5 C3                      		retn
 15655                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15656                                  
 15657                                  seterr:					
 15658 000019A6 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15659 000019A7 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15660 000019A8 C3                      		retn
 15661                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15662 000019A9 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15663                                  
 15664                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15665                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15666                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15667                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15668                                  
 15669                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15670                                  
 15671                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15672                                  
 15673                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15674                                  ;
 15675                                  ;   on entry:
 15676                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15677                                  ;
 15678                                  ;   on exit:
 15679                                  ;	carry clear
 15680                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15681                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15682                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15683                                  ;
 15684                                  ;	carry set:
 15685                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15686                                  
 15687                                  read_volume_id:
 15688 000019AB 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15689 000019AC 51                      		push	cx
 15690 000019AD 53                      		push	bx
 15691 000019AE 50                      		push	ax
 15692 000019AF 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15693 000019B0 57                      		push	di
 15694 000019B1 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15695 000019B2 07                      		pop	es
 15696 000019B3 BF[AA08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15697 000019B6 BE[9E08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15698                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15699 000019B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15700 000019BC F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15701 000019BE 5F                      		pop	di
 15702 000019BF 07                      		pop	es
 15703 000019C0 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15704                                  					; # of fats
 15705 000019C4 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15706                                  					; sectors / fat
 15707 000019C8 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15708 000019CA 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15709                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15710                                  					;
 15711                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15712                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15713 000019CE 2EA3[A919]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15714                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15715                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15716 000019D2 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15717                                  					; # root dir entries
 15718 000019D6 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15719 000019D8 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15720                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15721                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15722 000019DA 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15723                                  next_sec:
 15724 000019DB 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15725 000019DC 2EA1[A919]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15726                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15727                                  					; get sector #
 15728 000019E0 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15729                                  					; sectors / track
 15730 000019E4 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15731 000019E6 F7F1                    		div	cx
 15732                                  
 15733                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15734                                  
 15735 000019E8 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15736                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15737 000019E9 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15738 000019EB 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15739 000019ED 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15740                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15741 000019F1 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15742 000019F3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15743 000019F5 E81BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15744                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15745 000019F8 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15746 000019FA B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15747 000019FD B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15748                                  fvid_loop:
 15749                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15750 000019FF 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15751                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15752 00001A01 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15753 00001A03 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15754 00001A06 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15755 00001A08 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15756 00001A0B 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15757                                  ent_loop:
 15758 00001A0D 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15759 00001A10 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15760 00001A12 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15761 00001A13 2EFF06[A919]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15762                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15763                                  					; next sector
 15764 00001A18 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15765                                  notfound:
 15766                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15767                                  		;xor	si, si
 15768 00001A1A EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15769                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15770                                  
 15771                                  found_vid:
 15772                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15773                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15774 00001A1C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15775 00001A1D 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15776 00001A1F 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15777 00001A20 57                      		push	di
 15778 00001A21 1E                      		push	ds
 15779 00001A22 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15780 00001A23 BF[AA08]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15781 00001A26 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15782                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15783 00001A29 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15784                                  		;xor	al, al
 15785                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15786 00001A2B 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15787 00001A2C AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15788                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15789                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15790                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15791 00001A2D 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15792 00001A2E 07                      		pop	es
 15793                                  fvid_ret:
 15794                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15795 00001A2F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15796                                  				
 15797 00001A31 58                      		pop	ax
 15798                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15799                                  		; cf = 0
 15800                                  		;clc
 15801                                  rvidret:
 15802 00001A32 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15803 00001A33 59                      		pop	cx
 15804 00001A34 5A                      		pop	dx
 15805 00001A35 C3                      		retn
 15806                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15807                                  
 15808                                  no_vid:
 15809 00001A36 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15810                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15811                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15812 00001A37 EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15813                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15814                                  
 15815                                  readviderr:
 15816 00001A39 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15817 00001A3A 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15818 00001A3B EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15819                                  
 15820                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15821                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15822                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15823                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15824 00001A3D BE[AA08]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15825                                  		;
 15826                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15827                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15828                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15829                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15830 00001A40 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15831 00001A43 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15832                                  		;
 15833 00001A46 FC                      		cld
 15834 00001A47 C3                      		retn
 15835                                  
 15836                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15837                                  
 15838                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15839                                  ;
 15840                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15841                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15842                                  
 15843                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15844 00001A48 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15845 00001A49 56                      		push	si
 15846 00001A4A 51                      		push	cx
 15847                                  		
 15848                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15849                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15850                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15851                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15852                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15853                                  		;cld
 15854                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15855 00001A4B E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15856                                  
 15857 00001A4E F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15858 00001A50 59                      		pop	cx
 15859 00001A51 5E                      		pop	si
 15860 00001A52 5F                      		pop	di
 15861 00001A53 C3                      		retn
 15862                                  
 15863                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15864                                  
 15865                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15866                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15867                                  ;
 15868                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15869                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15870                                  
 15871                                  check_volume_id:
 15872 00001A54 57                      		push	di
 15873 00001A55 51                      		push	cx
 15874                                  		
 15875                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15876                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15877                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15878                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15879                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15880                                  		;cld
 15881                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15882 00001A56 E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15883                                  
 15884 00001A59 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15885 00001A5B 59                      		pop	cx
 15886 00001A5C 5F                      		pop	di
 15887 00001A5D C3                      		retn
 15888                                  
 15889                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15890                                  
 15891                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15892                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15893                                  ;
 15894                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15895                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15896                                  ;
 15897                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15898                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15899                                  ;
 15900                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15901                                  
 15902                                  fat_check:		
 15903 00001A5E 50                      		push	ax
 15904 00001A5F 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15905 00001A61 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15906 00001A64 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15907                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15908 00001A68 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15909 00001A6A 4E                      		dec	si
 15910                                  okret1:					
 15911 00001A6B 58                      		pop	ax
 15912 00001A6C C3                      		retn
 15913                                  
 15914                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15915                                  
 15916                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 15917                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15918                                  
 15919                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 15920                                  
 15921                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15922                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15923                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15924                                  
 15925                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15926                                  
 15927                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15928                                  		;db 0
 15929                                  
 15930                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15931                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15932                                  
 15933                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15934 00001A6D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15935                                  %endif
 15936                                  
 15937                                  ;align 16
 15938                                  
 15939                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15940                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15941                                  ; 29/09/2023
 15942                                  BCODEEND:

 15944                                  ; 13/12/2022
