 31402                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31403                                  ;*** toDigit - converts a character-digit to its binary counterpart
 31404                                  ;            -- verifies that CL contains a valid character-digit; if so, it
 31405                                  ; changes CL to its counterpart binary digit ((CL-'0') or (CL-'A'+10)).
 31406                                  ; A-F are considered valid iff gnradix is 16.
 31407                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31408                                  ; ENTRY:    CL contains a digit ('0' to '9' or, if gnradix==16, 'A' to 'F')
 31409                                  ; EXIT:     CL contains digit in binary (0 to 9 or, if gnradix==16, 0 to 15)
 31410                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set indicates invalid digit; carry clear indicates good digit
 31411                                  ; USES:     CL, Flags
 31412                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31413                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 31414                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 31415                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 31416                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31417                                  
 31418                                  gnradix:
 31419 00002B7D 0000                    	dw	0		; Must be a word--16x16 multiplication
 31420                                  
 31421                                  toDigit:
 31422 00002B7F 2E833E[7D2B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31423 00002B85 751C                    	jne	short td20	; Don't check hex digits if radix isn't 16
 31424                                  
 31425                                  toDigit_hex:
 31426 00002B87 80F961                  	cmp	cl,'a'	; 61h
 31427 00002B8A 7209                    	jb	short td10
 31428 00002B8C 80F966                  	cmp	cl,'f'	; 66h
 31429 00002B8F 7720                    	ja	short tdE	; Nothing valid above 'z' at all...
 31430 00002B91 80E957                  	sub	cl,'a'-10 ; 57h	; Make 'a'==10 and return.
 31431                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31432 00002B94 C3                      	retn
 31433                                  td10:	
 31434 00002B95 80F941                  	cmp	cl,'A'  ; 41h
 31435 00002B98 7209                    	jb	short td20	; Below 'A'?  Not a letter...
 31436 00002B9A 80F946                  	cmp	cl,'F'	; 46h
 31437 00002B9D 7712                    	ja	short tdE	; Above 'F'?  Not a digit.
 31438 00002B9F 80E937                  	sub	cl,'A'-10 ; 37h	; Make 'A'==10 and return.
 31439                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31440 00002BA2 C3                      	retn
 31441                                  toDigit_dec:
 31442                                  td20:	
 31443 00002BA3 80F930                  	cmp	cl,'0'		; If less than zero,
 31444                                  	;jb	short tdE	; Done.
 31445 00002BA6 720A                    	jb	short tdEr ; 08/04/2019
 31446 00002BA8 80F939                  	cmp	cl,'9'		; Or, if greater than nine,
 31447 00002BAB 7704                    	ja	short tdE	; Done.
 31448 00002BAD 80E930                  	sub	cl,'0'	; 30h	; Okay--make '0'==0 and return.
 31449                                  	;clc			; <- CLC is implicit from last SUB
 31450 00002BB0 C3                      	retn
 31451                                  tdE:	
 31452 00002BB1 F9                      	stc
 31453                                  tdEr:		; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 31454 00002BB2 C3                      	retn
 31455                                  
 31456                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31457                                  ;*** GetXNum - reads a 32-bit ASCII number at ES:SI and returns it in DX:AX
 31458                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31459                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:SI points to an ascii string to scan
 31460                                  ; EXIT:     ES:SI moved to first invalid digit, DX:AX contains value read
 31461                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if # is too big, or has no digits (EOL possibly)
 31462                                  ; USES:     ES:SI, DX, AX, Flags, gnradix
 31463                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31464                                  ; If the string is preceeded with "0x", the value is read as hexadecimal; else,
 31465                                  ; as decimal. After a read, you may check the radix by examining gnradix--it
 31466                                  ; will be 10 or 16.
 31467                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31468                                  
 31469                                  ; 08/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31470                                  
 31471                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31472                                  ; (SYSINIT:3109h)
 31473                                  
 31474                                  GetXNum:
 31475                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, ds>
 31476                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31477                                  	;push	bx
 31478 00002BB3 51                      	push	cx ; *
 31479                                  	;push	ds
 31480                                  
 31481 00002BB4 FC                      	cld
 31482 00002BB5 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31483 00002BB7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 31484 00002BB9 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31485 00002BBB 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			; Start with 0 (makes sense)
 31486                                  
 31487 00002BBD 2EC706[7D2B]0A00        	mov	word [cs:gnradix],10	; And default to a radix of 10 (dec)
 31488                                  
 31489 00002BC4 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]		; Now AX=0, BX=0, CH=0/CL=char, DX=0
 31490                                  	;call	toDigit
 31491 00002BC7 E8D9FF                  	call	toDigit_dec
 31492                                  	;jc	short gxnE		; If it's not a digit, leave now.
 31493                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31494 00002BCA 7233                    	jc	short gxnX
 31495                                  
 31496 00002BCC 08C9                    	or	cl,cl
 31497 00002BCE 7517                    	jnz	short gxn20		; Doesn't have '0x'
 31498 00002BD0 268A4C01                	mov	cl,[es:si+1]
 31499 00002BD4 80F978                  	cmp	cl,'x'			; Either 'x'...
 31500 00002BD7 7405                    	je	short gxn10
 31501 00002BD9 80F958                  	cmp	cl,'X'			; ...or 'X' means it's hexadecimal
 31502 00002BDC 7509                    	jne	short gxn20
 31503                                  
 31504                                  gxn10:	
 31505 00002BDE 2EC706[7D2B]1000        	mov	word [cs:gnradix], 16
 31506 00002BE5 46                      	inc	si			; Since we read "0x", march over it.
 31507 00002BE6 46                      	inc	si
 31508                                  
 31509                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 31510                                  ; GXN20--ES:SI = a digit in a number; if not, we're done
 31511                                  ;        DX:AX = current total
 31512                                  ;        BX    = 0
 31513                                  ;        CH    = 0
 31514                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 31515                                  
 31516                                  gxn20:	
 31517 00002BE7 268A0C                  	mov	cl,[es:si]	; Now DX:AX=current total, CH=0/CL=char
 31518 00002BEA 46                      	inc	si
 31519                                  
 31520 00002BEB E891FF                  	call	toDigit		; Accepts only valid digits, A-F -> 10-16
 31521 00002BEE 720D                    	jc	short gxnQ	; <- Ah... wasn't a digit. Stop.
 31522                                  
 31523 00002BF0 E80E00                  	call	mul32		; Multiply DX:AX by gnradix
 31524 00002BF3 720A                    	jc	short gxnX	; (if it's too big, error out)
 31525                                  
 31526 00002BF5 01C8                    	add	ax,cx		; Add the digit
 31527 00002BF7 11DA                    	adc	dx,bx		; (BX is 0!)--Adds 1 iff last add wrapped
 31528                                  	;jc	short gxnX	; If _that_ wrapped, it's too big.
 31529                                  	;jmp	short gxn20
 31530 00002BF9 73EC                    	jnc	short gxn20
 31531                                  gxnE:	
 31532                                  	;stc			; In this case, we need to set the carry
 31533 00002BFB EB02                    	jmp	short gxnX	; and leave--there were no digits given.
 31534                                  gxnQ:	
 31535 00002BFD 4E                      	dec	si		; Don't read in the offensive character.
 31536 00002BFE F8                      	clc			; And clear carry, so they know it's okay.
 31537                                  gxnX:	
 31538                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31539                                  	;pop	ds
 31540 00002BFF 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 31541                                  	;pop	bx
 31542 00002C00 C3                      	retn
 31543                                  
 31544                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31545                                  ;*** mul32 - multiplies the number in DX:AX by gnradix
 31546                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31547                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be multiplied, BX = 0, gnradix = multiplier
 31548                                  ; EXIT:    DX:AX has been multiplied by gnradix if carry clear; BX still 0
 31549                                  ; ERROR:   Carry set if number was too large
 31550                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 31551                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31552                                  
 31553                                  mul32:
 31554 00002C01 50                      	push	ax		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31555 00002C02 89D0                    	mov	ax,dx		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31556 00002C04 2EF726[7D2B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31557 00002C09 7211                    	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 31558                                  
 31559 00002C0B 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 31560 00002C0D 58                      	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 31561                                  
 31562 00002C0E 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 31563 00002C10 2EF726[7D2B]            	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry,  AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 31564 00002C15 87D3                    	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 31565 00002C17 01DA                    	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 31566 00002C19 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 31567 00002C1B C3                      	retn
 31568                                  m32E:	
 31569 00002C1C 58                      	pop	ax
 31570 00002C1D C3                      	retn
 31571                                  
 31572                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31573                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 31574                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31575                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 31576                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 31577                                  ; ERROR:   None
 31578                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 31579                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31580                                  ; Note: The 386 has a 32-bit SHR, which would work perfectly for this... but we
 31581                                  ;       can't ensure a 386 host machine. Sorry.
 31582                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31583                                  
 31584                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31585                                  toPara:
 31586 00002C1E 51                      	push	cx		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:LLLL llll llll llll
 31587                                  
 31588 00002C1F B104                    	mov	cl,4		;
 31589 00002C21 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:0000 LLLL llll llll
 31590 00002C23 92                      	xchg	ax,dx		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh
 31591 00002C24 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31592 00002C26 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:hhhh 0000 0000 0000
 31593 00002C28 09D0                    	or	ax,dx		;    AX=hhhh LLLL llll llll
 31594                                  
 31595 00002C2A 59                      	pop	cx
 31596 00002C2B C3                      	retn
 31597                                  
 31598                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31599                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 31600                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31601                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 31602                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 31603                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 31604                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31605                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31606                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 31607                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 31608                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 31609                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 31610                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31611                                  
 31612                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31613                                  UmbHead:
 31614                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)
 31615                                  
 31616                                  	;push	si ; ?
 31617                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 31618                                  	;push	es
 31619                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 31620                                  
 31621                                  	; 09/04/2019
 31622                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 31623                                  
 31624 00002C2C B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31625 00002C2E CD21                    	int	21h
 31626                                  
 31627 00002C30 26A18C00                	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 31628                                  	
 31629                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31630 00002C34 83F8FF                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31631 00002C37 F5                      	cmc
 31632                                  	; if AX=0FFFFh -> CF=1
 31633 00002C38 C3                      	retn
 31634                                  
 31635                                  ; 01/01/2023
 31636                                  ;%if 0

 31684                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31685                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 31686                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31687                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 31688                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 31689                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 31690                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31691                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31692                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 31693                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 31694                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 31695                                  ;      ...
 31696                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 31697                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31698                                  
 31699                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31700                                  AddrToUmb:
 31701                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31702                                  	;push	cx
 31703                                  	;push	dx
 31704 00002C49 06                      	push	es
 31705                                  
 31706 00002C4A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 31707                                  
 31708 00002C4C E8DDFF                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 31709 00002C4F 7222                    	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 31710                                  
 31711                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31712                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *	; ES = first UMB segment
 31713 00002C51 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 31714                                  
 31715                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31716                                  atu10:
 31717 00002C53 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; ** ; 22/07/2023
 31718                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31719                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 31720                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 31721                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 31722                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 31723                                  
 31724                                  ;atu10:	
 31725                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 18/07/2023
 31726 00002C55 39D0                            cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 31727 00002C57 731D                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 31728                                  
 31729 00002C59 E8DDFF                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 31730 00002C5C 7501                    	jnz	short atu20
 31731                                  
 31732 00002C5E 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 31733                                  atu20:	
 31734                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31735                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 31736                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31737                                  	; ax = es
 31738                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31739 00002C5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31740 00002C64 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 31741 00002C6A 7403                    	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31742                                  
 31743                                  	;NextMCB es,ax
 31744                                  
 31745                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31746                                  	;;add	ax,[es:3]
 31747                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31748 00002C6C 40                      	inc	ax
 31749                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31750                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 31751 00002C6D EBE4                    	jmp	short atu10
 31752                                  
 31753                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31754                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 31755                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 31756                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31757                                  
 31758                                  atu30:	
 31759                                  	; 22/07/2023
 31760                                  	; ax = es + [es:ARENA.SIZE] 
 31761                                  	;mov	ax,es ; **
 31762                                  	;add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE] ; **
 31763 00002C6F 39D0                    	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 31764 00002C71 7303                    	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 31765                                  atuE:	
 31766 00002C73 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx ; 0	; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 31767 00002C75 49                      	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 31768                                  atuX:	
 31769 00002C76 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 31770                                  	
 31771 00002C78 07                      	pop	es	
 31772                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31773                                  	;pop	dx
 31774                                  	;pop	cx
 31775 00002C79 C3                      	retn
 31776                                  
 31777                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31778                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 31779                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 31780                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 31781                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 31782                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31783                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 31784                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 31785                                  ; ERROR:  None
 31786                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 31787                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31788                                  
 31789                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 31790                                  convUMB:
 31791 00002C7A 2E833E[7D2B]10          	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 31792 00002C80 7507                    	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 31793 00002C82 E8C4FF                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 31794                                  	;cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 31795                                  	;jne	short cu10
 31796                                  	;inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31797                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31798 00002C85 40                      	inc	ax
 31799 00002C86 7401                    	jz	short cu10	; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 31800 00002C88 48                      	dec	ax
 31801                                  cu10:	
 31802 00002C89 C3                      	retn

 32156                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32157                                  ;*** stowSiz - marks a given UMB as having a given minimum size

 32339                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32340                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 32341                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 32342                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32343                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32344                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 32345                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 32346                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32347                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32348                                  
 32349                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32350                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 32351                                  findUMB:
 32352                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32353                                  	;push	ax
 32354                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32355 00002D52 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32356                                  	;push	dx
 32357                                  
 32358 00002D53 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32359                                  
 32360 00002D55 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 32361                                  
 32362 00002D57 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32363                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32364                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32365 00002D5A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32366                                  
 32367                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32368                                  fu10:
 32369 00002D5C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 32370                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32371                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 32372                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 32373                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 32374                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32375                                  
 32376                                  ;fu10:	
 32377 00002D5E 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 32378 00002D60 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 32379                                  
 32380 00002D62 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32381 00002D65 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 32382                                  
 32383 00002D67 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32384                                  fu20:	
 32385                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32386                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32387                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32388 00002D68 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 32389 00002D6E 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32390                                  
 32391                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32392                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32393                                  	; ax = es
 32394                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 32395                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32396 00002D70 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32397 00002D75 40                      	inc	ax
 32398                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32399                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 32400 00002D76 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 32401                                  fuE:	
 32402 00002D78 F9                      	stc
 32403                                  fuX:
 32404                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32405                                  	;pop	dx
 32406                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32407 00002D79 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32408                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 32409 00002D7A C3                      	retn
 32410                                  
 32411                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32412                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32413                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32414                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32415                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32416                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32417                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32418                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32419                                  
 32420                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32421                                  BigFree:
 32422                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32423                                  	;push	bx
 32424 00002D7B 51                      	push	cx
 32425                                  
 32426 00002D7C E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32427 00002D7F 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 32428                                  
 32429 00002D81 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32430 00002D83 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32431                                  
 32432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32433                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32434                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32435                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32436                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32437                                  
 32438                                  bf10:	
 32439 00002D85 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32440 00002D88 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32441                                  
 32442                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32443 00002D8A 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32444 00002D90 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32445                                  
 32446 00002D92 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32447                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32448 00002D96 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32449                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32450                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32451 00002D98 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32452                                  
 32453 00002D9A 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32454                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32455 00002D9C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32456                                  
 32457                                  bf20:	
 32458                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32459                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32460                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32461                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32462 00002D9E 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32463 00002DA4 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32464                                  
 32465                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32466 00002DA6 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32467                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32468 00002DA8 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32469 00002DAD 40                      	inc     ax
 32470 00002DAE 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32471                                  
 32472 00002DB0 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32473                                  
 32474 00002DB2 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32475 00002DB4 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32476 00002DB6 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32477 00002DB8 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32478                                  bfE:	
 32479 00002DBA F9                      	stc
 32480                                  bfX:
 32481 00002DBB 59                      	pop	cx
 32482                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32483                                  	;pop	bx
 32484 00002DBC C3                      	retn

 32490                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was

 32515 00002DC1 8A87[2A1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32516

 32518

 32523 00002DC7 C3                      	retn

 32525                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32526                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32527                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32528                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32529                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32530                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32531                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32532                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32533                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32534                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32535                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32536                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32537                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32538                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32539                                  
 32540                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 32541                                  
 32542                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32543                                  
 32544                                  shrinkMCB:
 32545                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32546                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32547                                  	;push	bx
 32548 00002DC8 51                      	push	cx
 32549 00002DC9 06                      	push	es
 32550                                  
 32551 00002DCA 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32552                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32553                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32554                                  
 32555 00002DCC 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32556                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32557 00002DD1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32558                                  
 32559 00002DD3 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32560                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32561                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32562                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32563                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32564                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32565                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32566 00002DD6 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32567 00002DD8 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32568                                  
 32569 00002DDA 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32570                                  	
 32571                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32572                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32573 00002DDF 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32574                                  
 32575 00002DE1 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32576 00002DE6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32577                                  
 32578 00002DEC 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32579 00002DEE 40                      	inc	ax
 32580 00002DEF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32581                                  
 32582 00002DF1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32583 00002DF3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32584                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32585                                  	; ax > 0
 32586 00002DF5 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32587                                  
 32588                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32589 00002DF6 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32590                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32591 00002DFB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32592                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32593                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32594                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32595                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32596                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32597                                  
 32598                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32599 00002DFF E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32600                                  
 32601                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32602                                  	; cf=0
 32603                                  	;clc
 32604                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32605                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32606                                  smE:	
 32607                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32608                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32609                                  	;stc
 32610                                  smX:	
 32611                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32612 00002E02 07                      	pop	es
 32613 00002E03 59                      	pop	cx
 32614                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32615                                  	;pop	bx
 32616 00002E04 C3                      	retn
 32617                                  
 32618                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32619                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32620                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32621                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32622                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32623                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32624                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32625                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32626                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32627                                  ;
 32628                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32629                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32630                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32631                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32632                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32633                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32634                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32635                                  ;       Endif
 32636                                  ;    Endif
 32637                                  ; Endif
 32638                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32639                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32640                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32641                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32642                                  ;    ENDIF
 32643                                  ; ENDIF
 32644                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32645                                  
 32646                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32647                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 32648                                  _hideUMB_:
 32649                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32650                                  	; ds = cs
 32651                                  
 32652                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32653                                  	;push	bx
 32654                                  	;push	dx
 32655 00002E05 06                      	push	es
 32656                                  
 32657 00002E06 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32658 00002E08 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 32659 00002E0B 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 32660                                  
 32661 00002E0D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 32662 00002E0F E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 32663 00002E12 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 32664                                  
 32665 00002E14 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32666 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32667 00002E17 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32668 00002E1A 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32669                                  
 32670 00002E1B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32671 00002E1D 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.

 33323                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33324                                  ;
 33325                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33326                                  ;
 33327                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33328                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33329                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33330                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33331                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33332                                  ;
 33333                                  ;	Output : none
 33334                                  ;
 33335                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33336                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33337                                  ;
 33338                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33339                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33340                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33341                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33342                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33343                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33344                                  
 33345                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33346                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33347                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33348                                  InitDevLoad:
 33349                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33350                                  	;push	es ; *
 33351                                  
 33352                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33353                                  	; ds = cs
 33354 00002FE4 803E[7B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33355                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33356                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33357 00002FE9 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33358                                  
 33359                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33360                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33361                                  ; %if 0
 33362                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33363 00002FEB 803E[6B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33364                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33365 00002FF0 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33366                                  
 33367                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33368                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33369                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33370                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33371                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33372                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33373                                  
 33374 00002FF2 E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33375                                  
 33376 00002FF5 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33377 00002FF8 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33378 00002FFB E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33379 00002FFE 9C                      	pushf
 33380 00002FFF E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33381 00003002 9D                      	popf
 33382                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33383                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33384                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33385 00003003 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33386                                  
 33387                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33388                                  
 33389                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33390                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33391                                  InitForConv:
 33392                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33393                                  	; ds = cs
 33394 00003005 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33395                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33396 00003008 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33397 0000300A E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33398 0000300D E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33399                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33400 00003010 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33401                                  					;  in low memory
 33402                                  InitForHi:
 33403                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33404                                  	; ds = cs
 33405                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33406                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33407                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33408 00003012 A1[711F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33409 00003015 8B16[6D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33410 00003019 0316[6F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33411 0000301D EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33412                                  
 33413                                  InitForLo:
 33414                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33415                                  	; ds = cs
 33416                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33417 0000301F C606[7B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33418                                  initforlo_x:
 33419                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33420                                  	; ds = cs
 33421                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33422                                  					;  we are loading low
 33423                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 33424                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33425 00003024 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33426 00003027 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33427                                  idl1:
 33428 0000302B E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33429                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33430                                  	; ds = cs
 33431                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33432                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33433                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33434                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33435 0000302E A3[5F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33436 00003031 8916[611F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33437 00003035 C706[631F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33438 0000303B A3[651F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33439                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33440                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33441 0000303E C3                      	retn
 33442                                  
 33443                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33444                                  ;
 33445                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33446                                  ;
 33447                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33448                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33449                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33450                                  ;		   current UMB
 33451                                  ;
 33452                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33453                                  
 33454                                  SpaceInUMB:
 33455                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33456                                  	; ds = cs
 33457                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 33458                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 33459                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 33460 0000303F A1[6F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 33461 00003042 0306[6D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 33462 00003046 2B06[711F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 33463                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33464                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 33465                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 33466                                  	;stc
 33467                                  	;retn
 33468                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33469 0000304A 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 33470 0000304D 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 33471                                  spcinumb1:
 33472 0000304F 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 33473                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33474                                  	; ds = cs
 33475 00003050 3B06[5D1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 33476                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 33477                                  spcinumb2:
 33478 00003054 C3                      	retn
 33479                                  
 33480                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33481                                  ;
 33482                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 33483                                  ;
 33484                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 33485                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 33486                                  ;
 33487                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33488                                  
 33489                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33490                                  ;
 33491                                  ;PrepareMark:
 33492                                  ;	push	ds
 33493                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 33494                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33495                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33496                                  ;	pop	ds
 33497                                  ;
 33498                                  ;	inc	ax
 33499                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33500                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33501                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33502                                  ;	retn
 33503                                  
 33504                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33505                                  ;
 33506                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33507                                  ;
 33508                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33509                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33510                                  ;		 the device.
 33511                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33512                                  ;
 33513                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 33514                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33515                                  ;	UMB.
 33516                                  ;
 33517                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33518                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33519                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33520                                  ;
 33521                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33522                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33523                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 33524                                  
 33525                                  GetUMBForDev:
 33526                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33527                                  	; ds = cs
 33528 00003055 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 33529 00003058 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33530 0000305B CD21                    	int	21h
 33531                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 33532                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 33533                                  
 33534 0000305D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33535                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 33536                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33537 0000305F 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 33538                                  
 33539 00003061 4B                      	dec	bx
 33540                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33541                                  	; ds = cs
 33542 00003062 391E[5D1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 33543                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 33544 00003066 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 33545                                  
 33546 00003068 43                      	inc	bx
 33547                                  
 33548 00003069 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33549 0000306C CD21                    	int	21h
 33550 0000306E 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33551                                  
 33552                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33553                                  	;dec	ax
 33554                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33555                                  	;
 33556                                  PrepareMark:
 33557 00003070 1E                      	push	ds
 33558 00003071 48                      	dec	ax
 33559 00003072 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33560 00003074 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33561 0000307A C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33562 00003080 40                      	inc	ax
 33563 00003081 1F                      	pop	ds
 33564                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33565                                  	; ds = cs
 33566                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33567                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33568                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33569                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 33570 00003082 891E[6F1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 33571 00003086 A3[6D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33572 00003089 A3[711F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33573                                  	;
 33574                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33575                                  	; cf=0
 33576                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 33577 0000308C C3                      	retn
 33578                                  
 33579                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33580                                  %if 1
 33581                                  gufd_err:
 33582 0000308D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33583                                  gufd_error:
 33584 0000308F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33585 00003091 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 33586 00003092 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 33587                                  %endif
 33588                                  
 33589                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33590                                  %if 0
 33591                                  gufd_err:
 33592                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33593                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33594                                  	; ds = cs
 33595                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 33596                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33597                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33598                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 33599                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33600                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33601                                  	stc
 33602                                  	retn
 33603                                  %endif
 33604                                  
 33605                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33606                                  ;
 33607                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33608                                  ;
 33609                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33610                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33611                                  ;
 33612                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33613                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 33614                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 33615                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 33616                                  ;
 33617                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 33618                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 33619                                  ;
 33620                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33621                                  
 33622                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33623                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 33624                                  
 33625                                  DevSetMark:
 33626 00003094 06                      	push	es
 33627                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33628                                  	;push	di
 33629 00003095 1E                      	push	ds
 33630 00003096 56                      	push	si
 33631 00003097 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33632 00003099 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 33633 0000309F 40                      	inc	ax
 33634 000030A0 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 33635                                  
 33636                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 33637                                  
 33638 000030A4 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 33639                                  
 33640                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33641                                  	; ds = cs
 33642                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 33643 000030A5 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 33644                                  
 33645 000030A9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33646 000030AB FC                      	cld
 33647                                  dsm_again:
 33648 000030AC AC                      	lodsb
 33649 000030AD 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33650 000030AF 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 33651 000030B1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33652 000030B3 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33653                                  isit_slash:
 33654 000030B5 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 33655 000030B7 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 33656 000030B9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33657 000030BB EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33658                                  isit_null:
 33659 000030BD 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33660 000030BF 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 33661 000030C1 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 33662                                  
 33663 000030C3 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 33664 000030C6 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33665                                  dsm_next_char:
 33666 000030C9 AC                      	lodsb

 34139                                  ;
 34140                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34141                                  ;
 34142                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34143                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34144                                  ;
 34145                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 34146                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34147                                  ;
 34148                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34149                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34150                                  ;
 34151                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34152                                  
 34153                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34154                                  
 34155                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34156                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34157                                  
 34158                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34159                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34160                                  GetHexNum:
 34161 00003218 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34162 0000321A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34163                                  ghn_next:
 34164 0000321C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34165 0000321F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34166 00003222 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34167 00003224 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34168 00003227 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34169 00003229 50                      	push	ax
 34170 0000322A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34171 0000322C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 34172 0000322F 58                      	pop	ax
 34173                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34174 00003230 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34175 00003233 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34176 00003235 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34177                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34178                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34179 00003238 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34180                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34181                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34182                                  ghn_shift1:
 34183 0000323A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34184 0000323C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34185 0000323E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34186 00003240 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34187 00003242 46                      	inc	si
 34188 00003243 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34189                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34190 00003245 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
