 34260                                  
 34261                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34262                                  ;
 34263                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34264                                  ;
 34265                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34266                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34267                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34268                                  ;			; DS = data
 34269                                  ;
 34270                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34271                                  ;
 34272                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34273                                  ;
 34274                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34275                                  
 34276                                  umb_insert:
 34277 00003278 1E                      	push	ds
 34278                                  
 34279                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34280                                  	; ds = cs
 34281                                  
 34282                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34283 00003279 8E1E[8A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34284                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34285 0000327D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34286 00003281 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34287 00003283 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34288                                  ui_next:
 34289 00003285 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34290                                  					;    new block
 34291 00003287 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34292                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34293                                  					;    last
 34294 00003289 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34295 0000328F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34296                                  					; N: get next block
 34297 00003291 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34298                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34299 00003293 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34300 00003296 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34301                                  
 34302                                  ui_insert:
 34303 00003298 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34304 0000329A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34305                                  
 34306 0000329B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34307 0000329D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34308                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34309 0000329F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34310                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34311 000032A4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34312                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34313 000032AA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34314                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34315 000032AE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34316                                  
 34317                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34318                                  
 34319 000032B4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34320 000032B6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34321 000032BC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34322                                  					; mark as free
 34323 000032C3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34324                                  					; start & end of new block
 34325 000032C6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34326                                  
 34327                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34328                                  	
 34329 000032CB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34330 000032CD 43                      	inc	bx
 34331 000032CE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34332 000032D0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34333                                  
 34334                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34335                                  					; this block
 34336 000032D1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34337                                  	
 34338 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34339 000032D9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34340 000032E0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34341 000032E4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34342                                  
 34343 000032EB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34344                                  
 34345                                  ui_append:
 34346                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34347 000032ED 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34348 000032F2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34349                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34350                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34351                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34352 000032F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34353                                  
 34354 000032FE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34355 00003300 40                      	inc	ax
 34356 00003301 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34357                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34358 00003303 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34359                                  
 34360 00003305 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34361                                  
 34362 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34363 0000330D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34364 00003314 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34365 00003318 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34366                                  
 34367                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34368 0000331F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx

 34370 00003327 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34371                                  					; mark as free
 34372 0000332E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34373 0000332F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34374                                  ui_done:
 34375                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34376 00003334 1F                      	pop	ds
 34377                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34378                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34379                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34380 00003335 C3                      	retn

 34406                                  ;	retn
 34407                                  
 34408                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34409                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce

 34411                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34412                                  
 34413                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34414                                  
 34415                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34416                                  ;
 34417                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34418                                  ;
 34419                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34420                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34421                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34422                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34423                                  ;
 34424                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34425                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34426                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34427                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34428                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34429                                  ;
 34430                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34431                                  
 34432                                  umb_coalesce:
 34433                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34434                                  	; ds = cs
 34435 00003345 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34436                                  
 34437 00003346 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34438                                  
 34439                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34440                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34441 00003348 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34442 0000334C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34443                                  uc_nextfree:
 34444 00003351 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34445 00003353 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34446                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34447 00003355 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34448 0000335A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34449                                  					; N: get next arena
 34450 0000335C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34451 0000335F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34452 00003361 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34453                                  uc_again:
 34454 00003363 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34455 00003366 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34456                                  uc_check:
 34457 00003368 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34458 0000336D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34459                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34460 0000336F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34461 00003374 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34462                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34463 00003375 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34464 00003379 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34465 0000337C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34466 0000337E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34467                                  
 34468                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34469                                  ;uc_done:
 34470                                  	;retn

 34493 00003392 891E[731F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 34494 00003396 8C06[751F]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 34495                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34519                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34520                                  ;
 34521                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 34522                                  ;
 34523                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 34524                                  ;
 34525                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 34526                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 34527                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 34528                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 34529                                  ;				NC
 34530                                  ;			  else 
 34531                                  ;				CY
 34532                                  ;
 34533                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 34534                                  ;
 34535                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34536

 34538                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34539                                  	; ds = cs

 34543                                  					;   possible
 34544                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34546                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 34547                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 34548                                  					; the largest UMB
 34549 000033B8 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 34550 000033BA 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 34551

 34553                                  
 34554                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34555 000033BE FF1E[731F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]

 34557

 34562                                  ua_err:
 34563 000033C7 F9                      	stc	
 34564                                  
 34565                                  	;clc
 34566                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34567                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34568                                  	; cf=0
 34569                                  	;clc 
 34570                                  ua_done:
 34571 000033C8 58                      	pop	ax
 34572 000033C9 C3                      	retn

 34654                                  					; mark as free

 34656 00003419 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx

 34659                                  	; 31/12/2022

 34665                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 34666                                  					;  just below Top of Mem

 34733 00003458 2B1E[6D1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 34734 0000345C 8E06[6D1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 34735                                  	
 34736 00003460 B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 34737 00003463 CD21                    	int	21h
 34738                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 34739                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 34740                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs

 34742 00003467 48                      	dec	ax
 34743 00003468 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34744 0000346A 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 34745                                  	; 01/01/2023

 34770                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 34771 00003480 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 34772 00003485 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 34773                                  ulu_next:
 34774 0000348A E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 34775 0000348D 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x

 34777 00003491 7404                    	je	short ulu_found

 34779 00003495 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next

 34788                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34789                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 34790                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 34791                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34792                                  
 34793                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34794                                  ;
 34795                                  ; Summary:
 34796                                  ;
 34797                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 34798                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 34799                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 34800                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 34801                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 34802                                  ;
 34803                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 34804                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 34805                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 34806                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 34807                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 34808                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 34809                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 34810                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 34811                                  ;
 34812                                  ; Example:
 34813                                  ;
 34814                                  ;   [menu]
 34815                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 34816                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 34817                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 34818                                  ;
 34819                                  ;   [network]
 34820                                  ;   include misc
 34821                                  ;   device=foo
 34822                                  ;
 34823                                  ;   [misc]
 34824                                  ;   device=bar
 34825                                  ;   include alternate
 34826                                  ;
 34827                                  ;   [alternate]
 34828                                  ;   device=tar
 34829                                  ;
 34830                                  ;
 34831                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 34832                                  ;
 34833                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 34834                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 34835                                  ;
 34836                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 34837                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 34838                                  ;   following order:
 34839                                  ;
 34840                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 34841                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 34842                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 34843                                  ;
 34844                                  
 34845                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 34846                                  
 34847                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 34848                                  
 34849                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 34850                                  
 34851                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 34852                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 34853                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 34854                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 34855                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 34856                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 34857                                  
 34858                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34859                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34860                                  
 34861                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 34862                                  
 34863                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34864                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 34865                                  
 34866 0000349F 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 35002                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35003                                  ;
 35004                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35005                                  ;
 35006                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35007                                  ;
 35008                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35009                                  
 35010                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35011                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35012                                  
 35013                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35014                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35015                                  parseline:
 35016                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35017                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35018                                  
 35019                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35020                                  
 35021                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35022                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35023                                  
 35024                                  nextswtch:
 35025                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35026                                  	je	short done_line
 35027                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35028                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35029                                  
 35030                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35031                                  
 35032                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35033                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35034                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 35035                                  	je	short getparm
 35036                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35037                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35038                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35039                                  swterr:
 35040                                  	retn
 35041                                  
 35042                                  getparm:
 35043                                  	call	check_switch
 35044                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35045                                  	jc	short swterr
 35046                                  getnext:
 35047                                  	call	getchr
 35048                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35049                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35050                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35051                                  	jnc	short nextswtch
 35052                                  ;swterr:
 35053                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35054                                  
 35055                                  done_line:
 35056                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35057                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35058                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35059                                  	jnz	short okay
 35060                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35061                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35062                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35063                                  	retn
 35064                                  
 35065                                  okay:
 35066                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 35067                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 35068                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 35069                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 35070                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 35071                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35072                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35073                                  	; cf=0
 35074                                  	;clc
 35075                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 35076                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35077                                  	jmp	setdeviceparameters
 35078                                  ;exitpl:
 35079                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35080                                  	; ds = cs
 35081                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35082                                  	retn
 35083                                  put_back:
 35084                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 35085                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35086                                  	jmp	short done_line
 35087                                  
 35088                                  %endif

 35091                                  ;
 35092                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35093                                  ;
 35094                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35095                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35096                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35097                                  ; error.
 35098                                  ;
 35099                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35100                                  
 35101                                  ; 09/09/2023
 35102                                  
 35103                                  err_swtch:
 35104 00003501 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 35105                                  err_check:
 35106 00003503 F9                      	stc
 35107                                  err_chk:
 35108                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 35109 00003504 C3                      	retn
 35110                                  
 35111                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35112                                  
 35113                                  check_switch:
 35114 00003505 E8240D                  	call	getchr
 35115                                  	;jc	short err_check
 35116 00003508 72FA                    	jc	short err_chk
 35117 0000350A 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 35118 0000350C 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 35119                                  	;jb	short err_check
 35120 0000350E 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35121 00003510 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 35122 00003512 77EF                    	ja	short err_check
 35123                                  
 35124 00003514 06                      	push	es
 35125                                  
 35126 00003515 0E                      	push	cs
 35127 00003516 07                      	pop	es
 35128                                  
 35129                                  	;mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 35130                                  	;mov	ch,0
 35131                                  	;mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 35132                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35133 00003517 BF[F049]                	mov	di,switchlist
 35134 0000351A 8A0D                    	mov	cl,[di]
 35135 0000351C B500                    	mov	ch,0
 35136 0000351E 47                      	inc	di	; 1+switchlist
 35137                                  
 35138 0000351F F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 35139                                  
 35140 00003521 07                      	pop	es
 35141 00003522 75DF                    	jnz	short err_check
 35142                                  
 35143 00003524 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 35144 00003527 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 35145 00003529 8B1E[5C49]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 35146 0000352D 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 35147 0000352F 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 35148                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35149 00003531 A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 35150                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 35151 00003533 74CF                    	jz	short done_swtch

 35154 00003538 72C7                    	jc	short err_swtch
 35155                                  
 35156 0000353A 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 35157 0000353C 75C3                    	jne	short err_swtch
 35158                                  
 35159 0000353E E8EB0C                  	call	getchr
 35160 00003541 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 35161                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35162                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 35163                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35164                                  	; ds = cs
 35165 00003542 C606[AE02]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '

 35168                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35169 0000354A C606[AE02]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 35170 0000354F 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 35171                                  
 35172                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 35173                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 35174                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 35175                                  
 35176                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35177                                  	;call	process_num
 35178                                  	;jmp	short process_num
 35179                                  
 35180                                  ;done_swtch:
 35181                                  ;	;clc
 35182                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35183                                  ;	; 12/12/2022

 35188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35189                                  ;
 35190                                  ; procedure : process_num
 35191                                  ;
 35192                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 35193                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 35194                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 35195                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 35196                                  ;
 35197                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35198                                  
 35199                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35200                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 35201                                  process_num:
 35202 00003550 850E[5C49]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 35203 00003554 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 35204                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35205 00003556 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 35206                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 35207 00003559 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 35208 0000355B A2[5B49]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 35209                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)

 35276                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35277                                  ;
 35278                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35279                                  ;
 35280                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35281                                  
 35282                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35283                                  	; (SYSINIT:3EDFh)
 35284                                  
 35285                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35286                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 35287                                  parseline:
 35288                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35289                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 35290                                  
 35291                                  	;push	ds ; *
 35292                                  
 35293                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35294                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35295                                  
 35296                                  nextswtch:
 35297 00003582 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35298 00003584 741C                    	je	short done_line
 35299 00003586 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35300 00003588 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35301                                  
 35302                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 35303                                  
 35304 0000358A 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 35305 0000358C 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 35306 0000358E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 35307 00003590 7402                    	je	short getparm
 35308 00003592 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 35309                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35310                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35311                                  swterr:
 35312 00003593 C3                      	retn
 35313                                  
 35314                                  getparm:
 35315 00003594 E86EFF                  	call	check_switch
 35316 00003597 891E[5C49]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 35317 0000359B 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 35318                                  getnext:
 35319 0000359D E88C0C                  	call	getchr
 35320                                  	;jc	short done_line
 35321                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 35322                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35323 000035A0 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 35324                                  ;swterr:
 35325                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35326                                  
 35327                                  done_line:
 35328                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35329 000035A2 F606[5C49]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 35330                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 35331 000035A7 750C                    	jnz	short okay
 35332 000035A9 F9                      	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 35333                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 35334                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35335 000035AA C3                      	retn
 35336                                  
 35337                                  ;exitpl:
 35338                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35339                                  	; ds = cs
 35340                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 35341                                  	;retn
 35342                                  
 35343                                  put_back:

 35345 000035AF FF0E[5A03]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 35346 000035B3 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 35347

 35366                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35367                                  ;
 35368                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 35369                                  ;
 35370                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 35371                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 35372                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 35373                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 35374                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 35375                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 35376                                  ;
 35377                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 35378                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 35379                                  ;
 35380                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 35381                                  ;
 35382                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35383                                  
 35384                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35385                                  
 35386                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35387                                  
 35388                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 35389                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 35390                                  
 35391                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35392                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 35393                                  
 35394                                  setdeviceparameters:
 35395                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35396                                  	; ds = cs
 35397                                  
 35398 000035C4 06                      	push	es
 35399                                  
 35400 000035C5 0E                      	push	cs
 35401 000035C6 07                      	pop	es
 35402                                  
 35403 000035C7 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35404 000035C9 8A1E[3448]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 35405 000035CD 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35406 000035D0 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 35407                                  
 35408 000035D2 C706[3748]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35409                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 35410                                  got_80:
 35411 000035D8 D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 35412 000035DA 8BB7[DC49]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 35413                                  
 35414                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 35415                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35416 000035DE BF[3A48]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 35417 000035E1 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 35418                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35419                                  	;mov	cx,59 ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM A_BPB.size
 35420 000035E4 FC                      	cld
 35421                                  	;repe	movsb
 35422                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35423 000035E5 F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 35424

 35426                                  
 35427                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35428 000035E8 F606[5C49]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35429                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 35430 000035ED 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 35431

 35433                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 35434 000035F2 A3[4748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 35435                                  
 35436                                  see_heads:
 35437                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35438 000035F5 F606[5C49]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 35439                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 35440 000035FA 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 35441                                  
 35442 000035FC A1[5749]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 35443                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 35444 000035FF A3[4948]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 35445                                  
 35446                                  heads_not_altered:
 35447                                  
 35448                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 35449                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 35450                                  
 35451                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 35452                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35453                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 35454                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35455 00003602 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 35456 00003605 A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 35457                                  
 35458 00003608 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 35459                                  
 35460                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 35461                                  
 35462                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 35463                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35464 0000360A 8A3E[4448]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 35465                                  	
 35466                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35467                                  	; ax = 2
 35468 0000360E 3906[4948]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 35469                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 35470 00003612 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 35471                                  
 35472 00003614 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 35473                                  
 35474                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 35475                                  
 35476 00003616 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 35477                                  
 35478                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 35479                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 35480                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 35481                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 35482                                  
 35483                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 35484                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 35485                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 35486                                  
 35487 00003618 833E[4748]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 35488 0000361D 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 35489 0000361F 833E[3748]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 35490 00003624 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 35491                                  
 35492                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 35493                                  
 35494 00003626 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35495                                  
 35496                                  ;	check for 320K
 35497                                  
 35498                                  not_144m:
 35499 00003628 833E[3748]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 35500 0000362D 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 35501 0000362F 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35502 00003634 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 35503                                  
 35504 00003636 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 35505 00003638 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 35506                                  
 35507                                  only_one_head:
 35508                                  
 35509                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 35510                                  
 35511 0000363A 803E[3448]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 35512 0000363F 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 35513                                  
 35514                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 35515                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 35516                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 35517                                  
 35518 00003641 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 35519 00003643 833E[4748]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 35520                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35521 00003648 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 35522                                  
 35523 0000364A B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 35524                                  
 35525                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 35526                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 35527                                  
 35528                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 35529                                  	; 03/01/2023
 35530                                  	; ax = 2
 35531 0000364C 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 35532 0000364D A2[3C48]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 35533                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 35534                                  
 35535                                  got_correct_mediad:
 35536 00003650 881E[4448]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 35537                                  
 35538                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 35539                                  
 35540 00003654 A1[3748]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 35541 00003657 F726[4948]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 35542 0000365B F726[4748]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35543 0000365F A3[4248]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 35544 00003662 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 35545                                  
 35546 00003663 C3                      	retn
 35547                                  
 35548                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine

 36100                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36101                                  ;
 36102                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36103                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36104                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36105                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36106                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36107                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36108                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36109                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36110                                  ;
 36111                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36112                                  
 36113                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36114                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)

 36122 0000386E 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0

 36125

 36140 0000388C 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36141                                  	
 36142 00003890 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36143                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36144 00003894 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36145                                  skip_cmmt:
 36146 00003896 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36147 00003898 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36148 0000389B 46                      	inc	si
 36149 0000389C 49                      	dec	cx
 36150 0000389D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36151 0000389F 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36152                                  no_commt:
 36153 000038A1 C3                      	retn

 36155                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36156                                  ; (SYSINIT:42C8h)

 36159                                  ;%if 0

 36163                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36164                                  ;
 36165                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36166                                  ;
 36167                                  ;   INPUT
 36168                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36169                                  ;
 36170                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36171                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36172                                  ;
 36173                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36174                                  ;       All
 36175                                  ;
 36176                                  ;   HISTORY
 36177                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36178                                  ;
 36179                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36180                                  
 36181                                  kbd_read:
 36182 000038A2 F606[FF46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36183 000038A7 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36184                                  
 36185 000038A9 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36186 000038AA 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36187 000038AC 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36188                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36189                                  kbd_loop:
 36190 000038AE B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36191 000038B0 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36192 000038B2 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36193 000038B4 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36194 000038B6 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36195 000038B8 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36196 000038BA 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36197 000038BC A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36198                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36199                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36200 000038BF 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36201                                  
 36202 000038C4 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36203 000038C6 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36204                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36205 000038C8 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36206                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36207 000038C9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36208 000038CB B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36209 000038CD CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36210 000038CF A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36211 000038D1 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36212 000038D3 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36213 000038D4 43                              inc     bx
 36214                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36215 000038D5 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36216                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36217 000038DA B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36218 000038DC CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36219 000038DE 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36220 000038E0 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36221 000038E2 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36222                                  
 36223                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36224 000038E4 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36225 000038E7 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36226                                  	
 36227 000038E9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36228 000038EC 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36229                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36230 000038EE BA[974B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36231 000038F1 E8DD0B                          call    print
 36232                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 36233 000038F4 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 36234 000038F9 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 36235                                  kbd_notf5:
 36236                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 36237 000038FB 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 36238 000038FE 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 36239                                  
 36240 00003900 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 36241 00003903 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 36242                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 36243 00003905 BA[D54B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 36244 00003908 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 36245 0000390B B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 36246 0000390D 881E[0347]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 36247                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 36248 00003911 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 36249 00003913 CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 36250 00003915 C606[0947]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 36251 0000391A 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 36252 0000391C 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 36253                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 36254 0000391E 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 36255 00003921 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 36256                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 36257 00003923 E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 36258 00003926 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 36259 00003927 C3                              retn			;
 36260                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 36261 00003928 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 36262 00003929 C3                              retn			;
 36263                                  
 36264                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36265                                  ;
 36266                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 36267                                  ;
 36268                                  ;   INPUT
 36269                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 36270                                  ;
 36271                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36272                                  ;       None
 36273                                  ;
 36274                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36275                                  ;       None
 36276                                  ;
 36277                                  ;   HISTORY
 36278                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36279                                  ;
 36280                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36281                                  
 36282                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36283                                  
 36284                                  set_numlock:
 36285                                          ; 04/01/2023
 36286                                  	;push	ax
 36287 0000392A 1E                              push    ds
 36288 0000392B 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 36289 0000392D 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 36290 0000392F 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 36291 00003932 2E3B06[724B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 36292 00003937 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 36293 00003939 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 36294 0000393E EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 36295                                  not_off:
 36296 00003940 2E3B06[704B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 36297 00003945 F9                              stc
 36298 00003946 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 36299 00003948 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 36300                                  set_done:
 36301 0000394D 1F                              pop     ds
 36302                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36303                                  	;pop	ax
 36304 0000394E C3                              retn
 36305                                  
 36306                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36307                                  
 36308                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36309                                  ;
 36310                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 36311                                  ;
 36312                                  ;   INPUT
 36313                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 36314                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 36315                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36316                                  ;
 36317                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36318                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 36319                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 36320                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 36321                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 36322                                  ;
 36323                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36324                                  ;       All
 36325                                  ;
 36326                                  ;   NOTES
 36327                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 36328                                  ;
 36329                                  ;   HISTORY
 36330                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36331                                  ;
 36332                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36333                                  
 36334                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36335                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 36336                                  
 36337                                  menu_check:
 36338                                  
 36339                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 36340                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 36341                                  
 36342 0000394F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36343 00003950 56                              push    si              ;
 36344 00003951 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 36345                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 36346 00003953 E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36347 00003956 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 36348 00003958 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 36349 0000395A 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 36350 0000395C 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 36351 0000395D EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36352                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 36353 0000395F 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36354 00003961 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 36355 00003963 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 36356 00003965 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 36357 00003967 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 36358 0000396A 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 36359 0000396F EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 36360                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 36361 00003971 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 36362 00003973 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 36363                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 36364 00003975 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 36365                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 36366 00003978 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 36367 0000397A 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 36368 0000397C 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 36369 0000397E 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 36370 00003980 E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 36371 00003983 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 36372 00003985 3A06[B91E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]	; 'N'
 36373 00003989 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 36374 0000398B 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36375 00003990 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36376                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 36377 00003992 3A06[C51E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]	; 'F'
 36378 00003996 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 36379 00003998 800E[FF46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 36380 0000399D EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 36381                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 36382 0000399F E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36383 000039A2 EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 36384                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 36385 000039A4 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36386 000039A5 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36387                                  
 36388                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 36389                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 36390                                  
 36391 000039A6 F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36392 000039AB 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 36393                                  ;
 36394                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 36395                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 36396                                  ;
 36397 000039AD E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 36398 000039B0 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 36399 000039B2 E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 36400                                  
 36401                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 36402                                  
 36403                                  menu_search:
 36404 000039B5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 36405 000039B7 BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 36406 000039BA E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 36407 000039BD 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 36408 000039BF C606[3C47]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 36409 000039C4 E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 36410                                  
 36411                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 36412                                  
 36413                                  menu_color:
 36414 000039C7 51                      	push	cx              ;
 36415 000039C8 52                      	push	dx              ;
 36416                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 36417                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36418                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 36419 000039C9 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 36420 000039CC 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 36421 000039CF 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 36422                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 36423                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 36424                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 36425                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 36426 000039D1 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 36427 000039D3 E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 36428 000039D6 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 36429 000039D8 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 36430 000039DB 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 36431 000039DE 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 36432                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36433                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 36434 000039E0 B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 36435 000039E2 D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 36436 000039E4 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 36437                                  check_color:
 36438 000039E6 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 36439 000039E8 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 36440 000039EA 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 36441                                  set_color:
 36442 000039ED 8816[FA46]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 36443 000039F1 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 36444 000039F2 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 36445 000039F3 E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 36446                                  
 36447                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 36448                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 36449                                  
 36450                                  menu_found:
 36451 000039F6 C606[0447]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 36452                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 36453 000039FB C606[0847]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 36454 00003A00 8026[0347]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 36455                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36456 00003A05 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 36457 00003A07 8916[0647]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 36458                                  
 36459 00003A0B E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 36460                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36461                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 36462                                  
 36463                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 36464                                  
 36465                                  menu_process:
 36466 00003A0E E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 36467 00003A11 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 36468 00003A13 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36469 00003A15 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 36470 00003A17 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 36471 00003A19 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36472 00003A1B 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 36473 00003A1D 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 36474 00003A1F 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 36475 00003A21 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 36476 00003A23 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 36477 00003A25 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 36478 00003A27 749E                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 36479 00003A29 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 36480 00003A2B 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 36481 00003A2D 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 36482 00003A2F 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36483 00003A31 E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 36484 00003A34 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 36485 00003A36 F9                              stc                     ;
 36486 00003A37 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 36487 00003A3A EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36488                                  menu_numlock:
 36489 00003A3C E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 36490 00003A3F EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36491                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 36492 00003A41 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 36493                                  
 36494                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 36495                                  
 36496                                  menu_default:
 36497 00003A43 8936[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 36498 00003A47 803E[0947]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 36499 00003A4C 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 36500 00003A4E E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
