 36501 00003A51 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 36502 00003A53 E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 36503 00003A56 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 36504 00003A58 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 36505 00003A5A E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 36506 00003A5D 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 36507                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 36508 00003A60 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 36509 00003A62 B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 36510                                  timeout_ok:                    ;
 36511 00003A64 881E[0847]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 36512                                  timeout_skip:
 36513 00003A68 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 36514                                  
 36515                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 36516                                  
 36517                                  menu_item:
 36518                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 36519 00003A6A 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 36520 00003A6D 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 36521 00003A6F 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 36522 00003A71 E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 36523 00003A74 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 36524 00003A76 F9                              stc                     ;
 36525 00003A77 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 36526 00003A7A EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 36527                                  
 36528                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 36529                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 36530                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 36531                                  
 36532                                  menu_itemfound:
 36533 00003A7C 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 36534 00003A7D 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 36535 00003A7F 8887[0A47]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 36536 00003A83 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 36537                                  
 36538                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 36539                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 36540                                  ;   description...
 36541                                  
 36542 00003A85 89B7[1447]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 36543 00003A89 89B7[2847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 36544 00003A8D 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 36545 00003A8F E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 36546 00003A92 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36547 00003A94 E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 36548 00003A97 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 36549 00003A99 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 36550 00003A9B 89BF[2847]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 36551                                  
 36552                                  menu_nextitem:
 36553 00003A9F E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36554 00003AA2 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 36555                                  
 36556                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 36557                                  
 36558                                  menu_getdefault:
 36559 00003AA5 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 36560 00003AA7 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 36561 00003AA9 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 36562 00003AAB E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 36563                                  menu_valid:
 36564 00003AAE 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 36565 00003AB0 8816[0547]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 36566 00003AB4 8B3E[0647]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 36567 00003AB8 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 36568 00003ABA 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 36569 00003ABC 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 36570                                  menu_chkdefault:
 36571 00003ABD 53                              push    bx              ;
 36572 00003ABE 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36573 00003AC0 8BB7[1447]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36574 00003AC4 B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 36575 00003AC7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36576 00003AC8 06                              push    es              ;
 36577 00003AC9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36578 00003ACA E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 36579 00003ACD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36580 00003ACE 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36581 00003ACF 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 36582 00003AD1 43                              inc     bx              ;
 36583 00003AD2 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 36584 00003AD6 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 36585                                  menu_nodefault:
 36586 00003AD8 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 36587                                  menu_setdefault:
 36588 00003ADA 881E[0447]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 36589                                  
 36590                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 36591                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 36592                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 36593                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 36594                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 36595                                  ;   with no timeout)
 36596                                  
 36597 00003ADE 803E[0847]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 36598 00003AE3 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 36599 00003AE5 F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 36600 00003AEA 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 36601 00003AEC E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 36602                                  
 36603                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 36604                                  
 36605                                  menu_display:
 36606 00003AEF B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 36607 00003AF1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36608 00003AF3 B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 36609 00003AF5 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36610 00003AF7 06                              push    es              ;
 36611 00003AF8 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 36612 00003AFB 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 36613 00003AFD 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 36614 00003B01 A3[0147]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 36615 00003B04 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 36616 00003B08 A2[0047]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 36617 00003B0B A1[FB46]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 36618 00003B0E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36619 00003B10 B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 36620 00003B13 8A3E[FA46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 36621 00003B17 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 36622                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 36623 00003B19 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 36624 00003B1E FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 36625                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 36626 00003B20 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 36627 00003B25 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 36628 00003B27 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 36629 00003B29 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 36630                                  menu_clear:
 36631 00003B2D CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 36632 00003B2F 07                              pop     es              ;
 36633 00003B30 8836[FE46]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 36634 00003B34 BA[124C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 36635 00003B37 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 36636                                  
 36637 00003B3A F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 36638 00003B3F 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 36639 00003B41 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36640 00003B45 8A36[FE46]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 36641 00003B49 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 36642 00003B4B B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 36643 00003B4D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36644 00003B4F BA[604C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 36645 00003B52 E87C09                          call    print           ;
 36646 00003B55 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 36647 00003B57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36648 00003B59 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 36649 00003B5C 8816[FD46]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 36650                                  
 36651                                  menu_nostatus:
 36652 00003B60 BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 36653                                  menu_disploop:
 36654 00003B63 E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 36655 00003B66 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 36656 00003B67 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 36657 00003B6B 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 36658                                  
 36659                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 36660                                  
 36661 00003B6D B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 36662 00003B6F 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36663 00003B71 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 36664 00003B74 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36665 00003B78 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 36666 00003B7A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36667                                  
 36668 00003B7C BA[4D4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 36669 00003B7F E84F09                          call    print           ;
 36670 00003B82 E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 36671 00003B85 BA[1E4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 36672 00003B88 E84609                          call    print           ;
 36673 00003B8B FF36[FF46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 36674 00003B8F 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36675 00003B94 E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 36676 00003B97 8F06[FF46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 36677                                  
 36678                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 36679                                  
 36680                                  menu_autoselect:
 36681 00003B9B 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 36682 00003B9E 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 36683 00003BA0 E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 36684                                  menu_abort:
 36685 00003BA3 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 36686 00003BA5 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 36687                                  
 36688                                  normal_boot:
 36689 00003BA8 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 36690 00003BAB 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 36691 00003BAD 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 36692 00003BB1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36693 00003BB3 E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 36694                                  
 36695                                  not_topmenu:
 36696 00003BB6 80BF[0A47]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36697 00003BBB 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 36698 00003BBD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36699 00003BBF 8BBF[1447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36700 00003BC3 E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 36701 00003BC6 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36702 00003BC8 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 36703 00003BCA E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 36704                                  
 36705                                  not_submenu:
 36706 00003BCD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 36707 00003BCF 8B9F[1447]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36708                                  
 36709                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 36710                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 36711                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 36712                                  
 36713                                  no_selection:
 36714 00003BD3 891E[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 36715 00003BD7 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 36716 00003BDB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36717 00003BDD 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36718 00003BDE 8E1E[B614]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 36719 00003BE2 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36720                                  
 36721                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36722                                  ;
 36723                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36724                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36725                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36726                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36727                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36728                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36729                                  ;
 36730                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36731                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36732                                  
 36733                                  copyblock_loop:
 36734 00003BE4 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36735 00003BE5 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36736 00003BE8 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36737 00003BE9 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36738                                  
 36739                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36740                                  
 36741                                  copyblock_begin:
 36742                                  
 36743                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36744                                  %if 0
 36745                                          push    ax              ;
 36746                                          push    cx              ;
 36747                                          push    si              ;
 36748                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36749                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36750                                          push    ds              ;
 36751                                          push    cs              ;
 36752                                          pop     ds              ;
 36753                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36754                                          pop     ds              ;
 36755                                          pop     di              ;
 36756                                          pop     si              ;
 36757                                          pop     cx              ;
 36758                                          pop     ax              ;
 36759                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36760                                  %endif
 36761                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36762 00003BEB 57                      	push	di
 36763 00003BEC BF[4947]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36764 00003BEF E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36765 00003BF2 5F                      	pop	di
 36766 00003BF3 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36767                                  
 36768 00003BF5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36769 00003BF7 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36770 00003BF9 57                              push    di              ;
 36771 00003BFA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36772 00003BFC 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36773 00003BFD 06                              push    es              ;
 36774 00003BFE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36775 00003BFF E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36776 00003C02 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36777 00003C03 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36778                                  copyblock_check:
 36779 00003C04 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36780 00003C06 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36781 00003C08 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36782 00003C0B EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36783                                  
 36784                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36785 00003C0D E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36786 00003C10 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36787 00003C13 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36788 00003C15 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36789 00003C17 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36790 00003C19 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36791 00003C1B EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36792                                  ;
 36793                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36794                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36795                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36796                                  ;
 36797                                  move_config:
 36798 00003C1D 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36799 00003C1F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36800                                  ;
 36801                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36802                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36803                                  ;
 36804                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36805 00003C20 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36806 00003C23 BE[3C47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36807 00003C26 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36808                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36809                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36810                                  copy_boot: 
 36811                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36812 00003C27 2E                              cs
 36813 00003C28 AC                      	lodsb
 36814 00003C29 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36815 00003C2B 47                              inc     di              ;
 36816 00003C2C E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36817                                  
 36818 00003C2E 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36819                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36820                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36821 00003C2F B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36822 00003C31 2E8B36[0647]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36823 00003C36 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36824 00003C38 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36825 00003C3A 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36826 00003C3B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36827 00003C3C BE[4947]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36828 00003C3F 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36829 00003C42 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36830 00003C45 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36831 00003C47 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36832 00003C49 46                              inc     si              ;
 36833 00003C4A 47                              inc     di              ;
 36834 00003C4B E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36835 00003C4D C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36836 00003C50 07                              pop     es              ;
 36837                                  
 36838                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36839                                  
 36840 00003C51 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36841 00003C53 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36842 00003C58 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36843 00003C5A 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36844                                  
 36845 00003C5B 51                              push    cx              ;
 36846 00003C5C F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36847 00003C5E 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36848 00003C5F 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36849 00003C61 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36850                                  
 36851                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36852                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36853                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36854                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36855                                  ;   is empty.
 36856                                  
 36857 00003C62 06                              push    es              ;
 36858 00003C63 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36859 00003C65 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36860 00003C66 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 36861 00003C6C E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36862 00003C6F 07                              pop     es
 36863                                  
 36864                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36865                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36866                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36867                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36868                                  
 36869                                  menu_done:
 36870 00003C70 803E[FB46]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36871 00003C75 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36872 00003C77 06                              push    es              ;
 36873 00003C78 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36874 00003C7B 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36875 00003C7D A1[0147]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36876 00003C80 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36877 00003C84 A0[0047]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36878 00003C87 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36879 00003C8B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36880                                  menu_exit:
 36881 00003C8C 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36882 00003C90 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36883                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 36884                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36885                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36886                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36887 00003C94 C3                      	retn
 36888                                  
 36889                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36890                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36891                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36892                                  
 36893                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36894                                  ;
 36895                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36896                                  ;
 36897                                  ;   INPUT
 36898                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36899                                  ;
 36900                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36901                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36902                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36903                                  ;
 36904                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36905                                  ;       None
 36906                                  ;
 36907                                  ;   NOTES
 36908                                  ;       None
 36909                                  ;
 36910                                  ;   HISTORY
 36911                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36912                                  ;
 36913                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36914                                  
 36915                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36916                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36917                                  
 36918                                  copy_envvar:
 36919 00003C95 51                              push    cx              ;
 36920 00003C96 56                              push    si              ;
 36921 00003C97 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36922 00003C98 06                              push    es              ;
 36923 00003C99 06                              push    es              ;
 36924 00003C9A 8E06[B614]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 36925 00003C9E 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36926                                  
 36927                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36928                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36929                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36930                                  ;
 36931                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36932                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36933                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36934                                  
 36935 00003C9F 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36936                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36937 00003CA1 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36938 00003CA2 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36939                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36940 00003CA4 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36941 00003CA6 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 36942                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36943 00003CA8 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36944 00003CAA 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 36945                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36946 00003CAC 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 36947 00003CAE 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36948 00003CAF 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36949 00003CB1 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36950 00003CB3 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36951 00003CB5 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36952 00003CB7 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36953 00003CB9 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36954 00003CBA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36955                                  copy_varsrch:
 36956 00003CBC 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36957 00003CBF 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36958 00003CC1 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36959 00003CC3 51                              push    cx              ;
 36960 00003CC4 56                              push    si              ;
 36961 00003CC5 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36962 00003CC7 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36963 00003CC8 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36964 00003CC9 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36965 00003CCB 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36966 00003CCF 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36967                                  
 36968                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36969                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36970                                  
 36971 00003CD1 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36972 00003CD4 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36973 00003CD6 56                              push    si              ;
 36974 00003CD7 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36975 00003CD9 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36976 00003CDB 2E8B0E[B414]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36977 00003CE0 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36978                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36979                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36980                                  
 36981 00003CE2 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36982 00003CE3 26                      	es	; 26h
 36983 00003CE4 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36984                                  
 36985 00003CE5 5E                      	pop     si
 36986                                  copy_envprep:
 36987 00003CE6 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36988 00003CE9 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36989 00003CEB 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36990 00003CEE 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36991                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36992                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36993                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36994 00003CF0 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36995 00003CF1 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36996 00003CF3 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36997 00003CF5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36998 00003CF7 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36999 00003CF9 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 37000 00003CFA EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37001                                  
 37002                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 37003 00003CFC 51                              push    cx              ;
 37004 00003CFD B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37005 00003D00 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 37006 00003D02 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37007 00003D03 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 37008                                  
 37009                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37010                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 37011                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37012                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37013                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37014                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37015                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37016                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37017                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37018                                  
 37019                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37020 00003D05 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37021 00003D07 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37022                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37023 00003D08 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37024 00003D0B 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37025                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37026 00003D10 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37027                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37028 00003D11 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37029 00003D12 07                              pop     es              ;
 37030 00003D13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37031 00003D14 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37032 00003D15 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37033                                  
 37034                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37035 00003D16 C3                              retn
 37036                                  
 37037                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37038                                  ;
 37039                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37040                                  ;
 37041                                  ;   INPUT
 37042                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37043                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37044                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37045                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37046                                  ;
 37047                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37048                                  ;       Same as above
 37049                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37050                                  ;
 37051                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37052                                  ;       All
 37053                                  ;
 37054                                  ;   NOTES
 37055                                  ;       None
 37056                                  ;
 37057                                  ;   HISTORY
 37058                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37059                                  ;
 37060                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37061                                  
 37062                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37063                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37064                                  
 37065                                  copy_block:
 37066 00003D17 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37067 00003D1A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37068 00003D1C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37069 00003D1E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37070 00003D20 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37071                                  
 37072 00003D22 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37073 00003D24 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37074 00003D26 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37075                                  
 37076                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37077                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37078                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37079                                  
 37080 00003D28 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37081 00003D2D 57                              push    di              ;
 37082                                  
 37083 00003D2E BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37084 00003D31 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37085 00003D34 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37086                                  
 37087 00003D36 BF[4947]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37088 00003D39 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37089 00003D3C 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37090                                  
 37091 00003D3E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37092 00003D40 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37093 00003D43 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37094                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37095                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37096 00003D45 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37097 00003D47 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37098 00003D48 51                              push    cx              ;
 37099 00003D49 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37100 00003D4B 56                              push    si              ;
 37101 00003D4C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37102 00003D4D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37103 00003D4F E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37104 00003D52 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37105 00003D55 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37106 00003D56 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37107 00003D57 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37108 00003D59 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37109                                  
 37110                                  copy_error:
 37111                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37112 00003D5B F8                      	clc
 37113                                  copy_skip:
 37114 00003D5C 5F                              pop     di
 37115                                  ;copy_error:
 37116                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37117                                  	;clc                    ;
 37118 00003D5D E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37119 00003D60 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37120                                  
 37121                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37122                                  
 37123                                  copy_line:
 37124 00003D62 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37125 00003D64 47                              inc     di              ;
 37126 00003D65 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37127 00003D67 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37128 00003D69 2E803E[B914]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37129 00003D6F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37130 00003D71 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37131 00003D74 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37132 00003D76 47                              inc     di              ;
 37133 00003D77 47                              inc     di              ;
 37134 00003D78 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37135                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37136 00003D7A E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37137 00003D7D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37138 00003D7F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37139 00003D81 47                              inc     di              ;
 37140                                  copy_next:
 37141 00003D82 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37142 00003D84 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37143                                  
 37144                                  copy_nextline:
 37145 00003D86 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37146 00003D89 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37147                                  
 37148                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37149                                  ;copy_done:
 37150                                          ;retn
 37151                                  
 37152                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37153                                  ;
 37154                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37155                                  ;
 37156                                  ;   INPUT
 37157                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37158                                  ;
 37159                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37160                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37161                                  ;
 37162                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37163                                  ;       DX
 37164                                  ;
 37165                                  ;   NOTES
 37166                                  ;       None
 37167                                  ;
 37168                                  ;   HISTORY
 37169                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37170                                  ;
 37171                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37172                                  
 37173                                  get_linenum:
 37174 00003D8B 50                              push    ax              ;
 37175 00003D8C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37176 00003D8E 51                              push    cx              ;
 37177 00003D8F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37178 00003D91 56                              push    si              ;
 37179 00003D92 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37180 00003D97 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37181                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37182 00003D99 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37183 00003D9C 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37184 00003D9E 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37185 00003D9F 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37186 00003DA1 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37187                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37188 00003DA3 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37189 00003DA4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37190 00003DA5 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37191 00003DA6 C3                              retn
 37192                                  
 37193                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37194                                  ;
 37195                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37196                                  ;
 37197                                  ;   INPUT
 37198                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37199                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37200                                  ;
 37201                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37202                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37203                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37204                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37205                                  ;
 37206                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37207                                  ;       None
 37208                                  ;
 37209                                  ;   NOTES
 37210                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37211                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37212                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37213                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37214                                  ;
 37215                                  ;   HISTORY
 37216                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37217                                  ;
 37218                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37219                                  
 37220                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37221 00003DA7 50                              push    ax              ;
 37222 00003DA8 51                              push    cx              ;
 37223 00003DA9 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37224 00003DAE 56                              push    si              ;
 37225 00003DAF 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37226 00003DB1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37227 00003DB2 06                              push    es              ;
 37228 00003DB3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37229 00003DB4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37230 00003DB7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37231 00003DB9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37232 00003DBB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37233 00003DBC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37234 00003DBD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37235 00003DBE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37236                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37237 00003DBF C3                              retn			;
 37238                                  
 37239                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37240                                  ;
 37241                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37242                                  ;
 37243                                  ;   INPUT
 37244                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37245                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37246                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37247                                  ;
 37248                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37249                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37250                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37251                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37252                                  ;
 37253                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37254                                  ;       AX
 37255                                  ;
 37256                                  ;   NOTES
 37257                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37258                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37259                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37260                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37261                                  ;
 37262                                  ;   HISTORY
 37263                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37264                                  ;
 37265                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37266                                  
 37267                                  find_block:
 37268 00003DC0 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37269 00003DC3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37270 00003DC5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37271 00003DC7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37272 00003DC9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37273 00003DCB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37274 00003DCD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37275 00003DCF 2E800E[B914]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37276 00003DD5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37277                                  check_line:
 37278 00003DD7 2E800E[B914]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37279 00003DDD E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37280 00003DE0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37281                                  next_line:
 37282 00003DE2 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37283 00003DE5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37284                                  ;find_exit:
 37285                                  ;	retn
 37286                                  
 37287                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37288                                  ;
 37289                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37290                                  ;
 37291                                  ;   INPUT
 37292                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37293                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37294                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37295                                  ;
 37296                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37297                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37298                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37299                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37300                                  ;
 37301                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37302                                  ;       AX
 37303                                  ;
 37304                                  ;   NOTES
 37305                                  ;       None
 37306                                  ;
 37307                                  ;   HISTORY
 37308                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37309                                  ;
 37310                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37311                                  
 37312                                  comp_names:
 37313 00003DE7 57                              push    di              ;
 37314                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37315 00003DE8 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37316 00003DEB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37317 00003DED E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37318 00003DF0 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37319 00003DF2 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37320 00003DF4 47                              inc     di              ;
 37321 00003DF5 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37322                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37323 00003DF8 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37324 00003DFA 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37325 00003DFC F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37326                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37327 00003DFD 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37328 00003DFE C3                              retn			;
 37329                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37330 00003DFF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37331 00003E01 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37332 00003E04 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37333 00003E06 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37334                                  
 37335                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37336                                  
 37337                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37338                                  comp_names_x:
 37339                                  	;
 37340                                  comp_names_safe:
 37341 00003E08 50                              push    ax
 37342 00003E09 51                              push    cx
 37343 00003E0A 56                              push	si
 37344 00003E0B 1E                              push    ds
 37345 00003E0C 0E                              push    cs
 37346 00003E0D 1F                              pop     ds
 37347 00003E0E E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37348 00003E11 1F                              pop     ds
 37349 00003E12 5E                      	pop	si
 37350 00003E13 59                              pop     cx
 37351 00003E14 58                              pop     ax
 37352 00003E15 C3                              retn
 37353                                  
 37354                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37355                                  ;
 37356                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 37357                                  ;
 37358                                  ;   INPUT
 37359                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37360                                  ;
 37361                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37362                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37363                                  ;
 37364                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37365                                  ;       None
 37366                                  ;
 37367                                  ;   NOTES
 37368                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37369                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37370                                  ;
 37371                                  ;   HISTORY
 37372                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37373                                  ;
 37374                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37375                                  
 37376                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37377                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37378                                  
 37379                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37380 00003E16 50                              push    ax              ;
 37381 00003E17 53                              push    bx              ;
 37382 00003E18 51                              push    cx              ;
 37383 00003E19 52                              push    dx              ;
 37384 00003E1A 56                              push    si              ;
 37385 00003E1B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37386 00003E1D 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37387 00003E21 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37388 00003E23 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37389 00003E24 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37390 00003E26 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37391 00003E28 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37392 00003E2B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37393 00003E2D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37394 00003E2F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37395 00003E31 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37396 00003E33 8A26[FA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37397 00003E37 3A1E[0447]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37398 00003E3B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37399 00003E3D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37400 00003E40 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37401 00003E42 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37402 00003E44 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37403 00003E46 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37404 00003E48 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37405 00003E4A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37406                                  print_other:                    ;
 37407 00003E4D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37408 00003E4F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37409 00003E51 8BBF[2847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37410 00003E55 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37411 00003E57 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37412 00003E5B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37413 00003E5D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37414 00003E60 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37415 00003E62 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37416 00003E64 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37417 00003E66 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37418                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37419 00003E68 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37420 00003E6B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37421 00003E6D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37422 00003E6F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37423 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37424                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37425 00003E73 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37426 00003E76 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37427 00003E78 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37428 00003E7A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37429 00003E7C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37430 00003E7E 06                              push    es              ;
 37431                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37432 00003E7F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37433 00003E82 47                              inc     di              ;
 37434 00003E83 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37435 00003E85 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37436 00003E87 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37437                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37438 00003E89 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37439 00003E8B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37440 00003E8D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37441 00003E8F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37442 00003E91 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37443 00003E93 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37444 00003E95 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37445 00003E97 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37446 00003E9A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37447 00003E9C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37448 00003E9E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37449 00003EA0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37450                                  print_done:                     ;
 37451 00003EA2 07                              pop     es              ;
 37452 00003EA3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37453 00003EA4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37454 00003EA6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37455 00003EA8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37456 00003EA9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37457 00003EAA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37458 00003EAB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37459 00003EAC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37460 00003EAD C3                              retn			;
 37461                                  
 37462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37463                                  ;
 37464                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37465                                  ;
 37466                                  ;   INPUT
 37467                                  ;       None
 37468                                  ;
 37469                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37470                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37471                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37472                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37473                                  ;
 37474                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37475                                  ;       None
 37476                                  ;
 37477                                  ;   NOTES
 37478                                  ;       None
 37479                                  ;
 37480                                  ;   HISTORY
 37481                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37482                                  ;
 37483                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37484                                  
 37485                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37486 00003EAE 8A1E[0447]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37487 00003EB2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37488 00003EB4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37489 00003EB7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37490 00003EBA 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37491 00003EBF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37492 00003EC1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37493 00003EC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37494 00003EC5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37495                                  check_time:
 37496 00003EC7 A0[0847]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37497 00003ECA 2A06[0947]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37498 00003ECE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37499 00003ED0 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 37500 00003ED5 C606[0947]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37501 00003EDA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37502                                  show_time:
 37503 00003EDD 53                              push    bx              ;
 37504 00003EDE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37505 00003EE0 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37506 00003EE4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37507 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37508 00003EE8 52                              push    dx              ;
 37509 00003EE9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37510 00003EEC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37511 00003EEE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37512 00003EF0 BA[C04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37513 00003EF3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37514 00003EF6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37515 00003EF8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37516 00003EF9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37517 00003EFB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37518 00003EFD 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37519 00003EFF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37520 00003F01 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37521 00003F03 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37522 00003F05 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37523 00003F07 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37524 00003F09 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37525 00003F0B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37526 00003F0D 5A                              pop     dx
 37527 00003F0E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37528 00003F10 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37529 00003F12 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37530                                  input_key:
 37531 00003F13 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37532 00003F15 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37533 00003F17 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37534 00003F19 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37535 00003F1B 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37536 00003F20 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37537 00003F22 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37538 00003F24 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37539 00003F26 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37540 00003F28 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37541 00003F2A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37542 00003F2C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
