 37543 00003F2E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37544                                  got_time:
 37545 00003F30 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37546 00003F32 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37547 00003F34 0036[0947]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37548 00003F38 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37549                                  got_key:
 37550 00003F3A 50                              push    ax              ;
 37551 00003F3B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37552 00003F3E 8706[0847]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37553 00003F42 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37554 00003F44 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37555 00003F46 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37556 00003F47 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37557 00003F4A 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37558 00003F4E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37559 00003F51 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37560 00003F53 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37561                                  
 37562                                  timeout_disabled:
 37563 00003F54 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37564 00003F55 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37565 00003F57 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37566 00003F59 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37567 00003F5B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37568                                  
 37569 00003F5D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37570 00003F5F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37571 00003F61 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37572 00003F64 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37573 00003F66 FE0E[0447]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37574 00003F6A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37575 00003F6D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37576 00003F6F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37577                                  not_up:
 37578 00003F71 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37579 00003F73 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37580 00003F75 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37581 00003F79 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37582 00003F7B FE06[0447]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37583 00003F7F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37584 00003F82 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37585                                  print1: 
 37586 00003F83 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37587                                  print2: 
 37588 00003F85 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37589 00003F88 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37590                                  to_input_key:
 37591 00003F8B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37592                                  not_down:
 37593 00003F8D F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37594 00003F92 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37595 00003F94 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37596 00003F96 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 37597 00003F98 8036[0347]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 37598 00003F9D E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37599 00003FA0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37600                                  not_f8:
 37601 00003FA3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37602 00003FA5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37603                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37604                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37605                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 37606 00003FA7 800E[0347]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 37607 00003FAC BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 37608 00003FAF B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 37609 00003FB1 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 37610                                  
 37611                                  normal_key:
 37612 00003FB3 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 37613 00003FB5 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 37614 00003FB7 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 37615 00003FB9 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no

 37617 00003FBE C3                              retn			;
 37618                                  not_backspace:

 37620 00003FC1 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no

 37622 00003FC7 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 37623 00003FC9 A2[0447]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 37624 00003FCC E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 37625 00003FCF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 37626 00003FD1 EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 37627                                  
 37628                                  select_done:

 37630 00003FD5 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37631 00003FD7 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 37632                                  
 37633                                  	; fall into disp_input
 37634

 37638                                  ;
 37639                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 37640                                  ;
 37641                                  ;   INPUT
 37642                                  ;       AL == character to display
 37643                                  ;
 37644                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37645                                  ;       None
 37646                                  ;
 37647                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37648                                  ;       None
 37649                                  ;
 37650                                  ;   NOTES
 37651                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 37652                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 37653                                  ;
 37654                                  ;   HISTORY
 37655                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37656                                  ;

 37658                                  
 37659

 37663                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 37664                                  	;mov	al,' '
 37665                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 37666 00003FDA B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 37667 00003FDC 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 37668 00003FDE 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 37669                                  disp_ok:
 37670 00003FE0 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 37671                                  disp_input_ok:
 37672 00003FE2 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 37673 00003FE4 CD21                    	int	21h
 37674 00003FE6 BA[1E4A]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 37675 00003FE9 E8E504                  	call	print
 37676 00003FEC 58                      	pop	ax
 37677 00003FED C3                      	retn

 37689 00003FFD C3                              retn

 37700                                  ;

 37712                                  show_status:
 37713 00003FFE 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 37714 00003FFF 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]

 37729                                  show_onoff:

 37731                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 37732                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37733                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 37734                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 37735

 37753                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37754                                  ;
 37755                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37756                                  ;
 37757                                  ;   INPUT
 37758                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37759                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37760                                  ;
 37761                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37762                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37763                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37764                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37765                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37766                                  ;
 37767                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37768                                  ;       AX
 37769                                  ;
 37770                                  ;   NOTES
 37771                                  ;       None
 37772                                  ;
 37773                                  ;   HISTORY
 37774                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37775                                  ;
 37776                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37777                                  
 37778                                  skip_token:
 37779 0000403B E84D00                          call    get_char
 37780 0000403E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37781 00004040 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37782 00004043 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37783                                  skip_check_eol:
 37784 00004045 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37785 00004047 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37786 00004049 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37787 0000404B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37788 0000404D F8                              clc
 37789                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37790 0000404E C3                      	retn
 37791                                  skip_token_eol:
 37792 0000404F F9                              stc
 37793                                  skip_token_done:
 37794 00004050 C3                              retn
 37795                                  
 37796                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37797                                  ;
 37798                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37799                                  ;
 37800                                  ;   INPUT
 37801                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37802                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37803                                  ;
 37804                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37805                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37806                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37807                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37808                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37809                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37810                                  ;
 37811                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37812                                  ;       AX
 37813                                  ;
 37814                                  ;   NOTES
 37815                                  ;       None
 37816                                  ;
 37817                                  ;   HISTORY
 37818                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37819                                  ;
 37820                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37821                                  
 37822                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37823 00004051 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37824 00004054 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37825 00004057 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37826 00004059 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37827 0000405C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37828 0000405E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37829                                  
 37830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37831                                  ;
 37832                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37833                                  ;
 37834                                  ;   INPUT
 37835                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37836                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37837                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37838                                  ;
 37839                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37840                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37841                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37842                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37843                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37844                                  ;
 37845                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37846                                  ;       AX
 37847                                  ;
 37848                                  ;   NOTES
 37849                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37850                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37851                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37852                                  ;
 37853                                  ;   HISTORY
 37854                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37855                                  ;
 37856                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37857                                  
 37858                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37859                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37860                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37861                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37862                                       
 37863                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37864                                  
 37865                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37866                                  ;
 37867                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37868                                  ;
 37869                                  ;   INPUT
 37870                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37871                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37872                                  ;
 37873                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37874                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37875                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37876                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37877                                  ;
 37878                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37879                                  ;       AX
 37880                                  ;
 37881                                  ;   NOTES
 37882                                  ;       None
 37883                                  ;
 37884                                  ;   HISTORY
 37885                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37886                                  ;
 37887                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37888                                  
 37889                                  skip_line:
 37890 00004060 E82800                          call    get_char
 37891 00004063 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37892                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37893 00004065 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37894 00004067 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37895                                  skip_line_done:
 37896                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37897 00004069 C3                              retn
 37898                                  
 37899                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37900                                  ;
 37901                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37902                                  ;
 37903                                  ;   INPUT
 37904                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37905                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37906                                  ;
 37907                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37908                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37909                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37910                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37911                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37912                                  ;
 37913                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37914                                  ;       AX
 37915                                  ;
 37916                                  ;   NOTES
 37917                                  ;       None
 37918                                  ;
 37919                                  ;   HISTORY
 37920                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37921                                  ;
 37922                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37923                                  
 37924                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37925                                  
 37926                                  get_number:
 37927 0000406A 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37928                                  num_loop:
 37929 0000406C E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37930 0000406F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37931 00004071 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37932 00004073 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37933 00004075 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37934 00004077 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37935 00004079 50                              push    ax              ;
 37936 0000407A B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37937 0000407D 52                              push    dx              ;
 37938 0000407E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37939 00004080 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37940 00004081 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37941 00004083 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37942 00004084 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37943 00004086 98                              cbw                     ;
 37944 00004087 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37945 00004089 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37946                                  
 37947                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37948                                  ;num_done:
 37949                                          ;retn
 37950                                  
 37951                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37952                                  ;
 37953                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37954                                  ;
 37955                                  ;   INPUT
 37956                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37957                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37958                                  ;
 37959                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37960                                  ;       AL == next character
 37961                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37962                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37963                                  ;
 37964                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37965                                  ;       AX
 37966                                  ;
 37967                                  ;   NOTES
 37968                                  ;       None
 37969                                  ;
 37970                                  ;   HISTORY
 37971                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37972                                  ;
 37973                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37974                                  
 37975                                  get_char:
 37976 0000408B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37977 0000408E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37978                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37979 00004090 26                      	es	
 37980 00004091 AC                      	lodsb
 37981 00004092 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37982 00004094 C3                              retn			;
 37983                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37984 00004095 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37985                                  nearby_ret:
 37986 00004098 C3                              retn
 37987                                  
 37988                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37989                                  ;
 37990                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37991                                  ;
 37992                                  ;   INPUT
 37993                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37994                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37995                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37996                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37997                                  ;
 37998                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37999                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38000                                  ;
 38001                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38002                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38003                                  ;

 38016                                  query_user:
 38017 00004099 F606[0347]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?

 38021                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38022                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38023                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38024                                  qu_1:

 38026 000040A8 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)

 38042                                  query_all:
 38043                                  
 38044                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38045                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38046                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38047                                  
 38048 000040BB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38049 000040BC BA[124D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38050 000040BF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38051 000040C1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38052                                  
 38053 000040C3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38054 000040C5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38055 000040C7 BF[5047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38056                                  find_match:                             ;
 38057 000040CA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38058 000040CC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38059 000040CE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38060 000040D0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38061 000040D1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38062 000040D3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38063 000040D5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38064                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38065 000040D8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38066                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38067 000040DA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38068 000040DD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38069 000040DF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38070                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38071 000040E1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38072 000040E3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38073 000040E4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38074 000040E6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38075 000040E8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38076 000040EA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38077 000040EC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38078 000040EF 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38079 000040F1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38080                                  cmd_notset:
 38081 000040F3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38082                                  line_print:                             ;
 38083                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38084 000040F5 26                              es
 38085 000040F6 AC                      	lodsb
 38086 000040F7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38087 000040F9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38088 000040FB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38089                                  non_null:                               ;
 38090 000040FD 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38091 000040FF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38092 00004101 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38093                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38094 00004103 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38095                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38096 00004106 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38097                                  non_space:                              ;
 38098 00004108 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38099 0000410A B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38100 0000410C CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38101 0000410E EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38102                                  
 38103                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38104 00004110 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38105                                  
 38106                                  generic_prompt:
 38107 00004113 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38108                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38109 00004116 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38110 00004118 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38111 0000411A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38112 0000411C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38113 0000411E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38114 00004121 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38115 00004123 A0[BC4C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 38116 00004126 800E[0347]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38117 0000412B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38118                                  not_func:
 38119 0000412D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38120 0000412F 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38121 00004133 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38122 00004135 3A06[B84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38123 00004139 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38124 0000413B 803E[B814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38125 00004140 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38126 00004142 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38127 00004144 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38128 00004146 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38129 0000414B A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38130                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38131 0000414E E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38132 00004151 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38133                                  
 38134 00004152 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38135 00004156 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38136                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38137 00004158 F8                      	clc
 38138                                  do_cmd:
 38139 00004159 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38140                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38141                                  	; cf=0
 38142                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38143 0000415A C3                      	retn
 38144                                  
 38145                                  skip_cmd:

 38149 0000415E F9                      	stc
 38150 0000415F C3                      	retn

 38207                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38208                                  
 38209                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38210                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38211                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38212                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38213                                  
 38214                                  disable_autoexec:
 38215                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38216                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38217                                  
 38218 00004194 F606[0347]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38219 00004199 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38220 0000419B F606[F946]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38221 000041A0 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38222 000041A2 800E[F946]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38223                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38224 000041A7 810E[0347]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38225 000041AD BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38226                                  dae_1:
 38227                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38228 000041B0 A0[3846]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38229                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38230 000041B3 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38231 000041B5 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38232 000041B7 8A1E[3946]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38233 000041BB B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38234 000041BD 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38235 000041BF 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38236 000041C2 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38237 000041C5 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38238 000041C7 881E[3946]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38239 000041CB 81C3[3A46]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38240 000041CF 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38241                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38242 000041D0 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38243 000041D3 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38244 000041D5 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38245 000041D6 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 38246 000041D8 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 38247                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 38248 000041DB 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38249                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38250                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 38251 000041DE C3                              retn
 38252

 38284                                  any_delim:

 38291 00004203 3C5D                    	cmp	al,']'

 38298                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 38299                                  delim:

 38304 0000420D 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 38305

 38307 0000420F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.

 38312 00004219 7407                    	je	short delim_ret

 38314 0000421D 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 38315 0000421F 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 38316

 38318

 38321                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 38322 00004221 F8                      	clc
 38323                                  ;endif

 38325                                  delim_ret:
 38326                                  	; 04/01/2023
 38327                                  	; cf = 0
 38328                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 38329 00004222 C3                      	retn

 38390                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38391                                  ; 
 38392                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 38393                                  ;
 38394                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38395                                  
 38396                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38397                                  
 38398                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38399                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 38400                                  mapcase:
 38401 00004243 51                      	push	cx
 38402 00004244 56                      	push	si
 38403 00004245 1E                      	push	ds
 38404                                  
 38405 00004246 06                      	push	es
 38406 00004247 1F                      	pop	ds
 38407                                  
 38408                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38409                                  
 38410                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38411                                  
 38412                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38413 00004248 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38414                                  ;else
 38415                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38416                                  ;endif
 38417                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38418                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38419                                  	;xor	si, si
 38420                                  
 38421                                  convloop:
 38422 0000424A AC                      	lodsb
 38423 0000424B 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38424 0000424D 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38425 0000424F 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38426 00004251 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38427 00004253 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38428 00004255 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38429                                  noconv:
 38430                                  
 38431                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38432                                  
 38433                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38434                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38435                                  
 38436                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38437                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38438                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38439                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38440                                  ;
 38441 00004258 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38442 0000425B 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38443 0000425D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38444 0000425F 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38445                                  check_eol:
 38446 00004261 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 38447 00004263 7406                    	je	short convdone
 38448 00004265 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 38449 00004267 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38450                                  ;endif
 38451                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38452 00004269 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 38453                                  convdone:
 38454 0000426B 1F                      	pop	ds
 38455 0000426C 5E                      	pop	si
 38456 0000426D 59                      	pop	cx
 38457 0000426E C3                      	retn

 38460                                  ;
 38461                                  ; procedure : round
 38462                                  ;
 38463                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 38464                                  ; perform bounds check.
 38465                                  ;
 38466                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38467                                  
 38468                                  round:
 38469                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38470 0000426F 1E                      	push	ds
 38471 00004270 0E                      	push	cs
 38472 00004271 1F                      	pop	ds
 38473                                  
 38474 00004272 50                      	push	ax
 38475                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 38476 00004273 A1[6203]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 38477                                  
 38478 00004276 E8D2CE                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 38479                                  
 38480                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 38481 00004279 0106[6403]              	add	[memhi],ax
 38482                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 38483 0000427D C706[6203]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 38484                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 38485 00004283 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 38486                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 38487 00004286 3B06[A502]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 38488                                  	;jae	short mem_err
 38489                                  	; 17/09/2023
 38490 0000428A 7322                    	jae	short mem_err2 ; ds = cs
 38491                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 38492 0000428C F606[BD14]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 38493 00004291 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 38494 00004293 06                      	push	es
 38495 00004294 56                      	push	si
 38496                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 38497 00004295 8B36[BB14]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 38498 00004299 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 38499 0000429B 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 38500 0000429D 48                      	dec	ax
 38501                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 38502 0000429E 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph

 38560                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 38561                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38562 000042DC 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 38563                                  	;cmp	al,9
 38564                                  	;ja	short notdig
 38565                                  	;clc
 38566                                  	;retn
 38567                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38568 000042DE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 38569 000042E0 F5                      	cmc

 38571                                  	;stc
 38572                                  notdig2:

 38575                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38576                                  ;
 38577                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38578                                  ;
 38579                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38580                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38581                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38582                                  ;
 38583                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38584                                  
 38585                                  getnum:
 38586 000042E2 53                      	push	bx
 38587 000042E3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38588                                  b2:
 38589 000042E5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38590 000042E8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38591                                  
 38592 000042EA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38593 000042EB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38594                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38595                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38596 000042EC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38597 000042EE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38598 000042F0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38599 000042F1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38600 000042F3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38601 000042F6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38602                                  
 38603 000042F8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38604                                  
 38605 000042F9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 38606 000042FC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38607 000042FE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38608 00004300 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38609 00004302 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38610 00004304 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38611 00004306 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38612 00004308 7417                    	je	short b15
 38613 0000430A 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38614 0000430F 7410                    	je	short b15
 38615 00004311 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38616                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38617                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38618                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38619                                  	;nop
 38620 00004313 740C                    	je	short b15
 38621 00004315 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38622 00004317 7408                    	je	short b15
 38623 00004319 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38624 0000431B 7404                    	je	short b15
 38625 0000431D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38626 0000431F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38627                                  b15:
 38628 00004321 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38629 00004326 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38630                                  b1:
 38631 0000432B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38632 0000432D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38633 0000432F 5B                      	pop	bx
 38634 00004330 C3                      	retn
 38635                                  badnum:
 38636                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38637                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38638 00004331 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38639                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38640 00004333 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38641 00004337 5B                      	pop	bx
 38642 00004338 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38643 00004339 C3                      	retn
 38644

 38646                                  
 38647                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38648                                  
 38649                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38650                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38651                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38652                                  ;	si = 0
 38653                                  ;	ax = country id
 38654                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38655                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38656                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38657                                  ;
 38658                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38659                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38660                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38661                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38662                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38663                                  
 38664                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38665                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38666                                  
 38667                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38668                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 38669                                  
 38670 0000433A 57                      	push	di
 38671 0000433B 50                      	push	ax
 38672 0000433C 52                      	push	dx
 38673                                  
 38674 0000433D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38675 0000433F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38676 00004341 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38677 00004344 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38678 00004347 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38679                                  
 38680 00004349 06                      	push	es
 38681 0000434A 56                      	push	si
 38682                                  
 38683 0000434B 0E                      	push	cs
 38684 0000434C 07                      	pop	es
 38685                                  
 38686 0000434D BF[9E45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38687 00004350 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 38688 00004353 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 38689                                  
 38690 00004355 5E                      	pop	si
 38691 00004356 07                      	pop	es
 38692 00004357 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 38693                                  
 38694 00004359 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 38695 0000435C 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 38696 0000435F 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 38697                                  
 38698 00004361 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 38699 00004362 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 38700 00004364 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 38701 00004367 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 38702 0000436A E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 38703 0000436D 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38704                                  
 38705 0000436F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 38706 00004371 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 38707 00004375 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38708                                  
 38709 00004377 46                      	inc	si
 38710 00004378 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 38711 00004379 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 38712 0000437A 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 38713 0000437B 5F                      	pop	di
 38714                                  
 38715                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 38716 0000437C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 38717 0000437F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 38718                                  
 38719                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 38720                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 38721                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38722 00004381 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 38723 00004383 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 38724 00004385 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 38725 00004388 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 38726                                  
 38727                                  setdoscntry_next:
 38728 0000438A 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 38729 0000438C 46                      	inc	si
 38730 0000438D 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 38731 0000438E E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 38732                                  
 38733                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 38734                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38735 00004390 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 38736                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 38737 00004391 F9                      	stc
 38738 00004392 C3                      	retn
 38739                                  
 38740                                  setdosdata_fail:
 38741 00004393 5E                      	pop	si
 38742 00004394 59                      	pop	cx
 38743 00004395 5F                      	pop	di
 38744 00004396 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 38745

 38747 00004398 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 38748                                  
 38749                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 38750 0000439B 2E8916[A645]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 38751 000043A0 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 38752 000043A3 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 38753 000043A6 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 38754 000043A9 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer

 38756

 38760

 38763 000043B3 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left

 38771 000043C0 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]

 38773 000043C6 F9                      	stc
 38774 000043C7 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38775 000043C9 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38776

 38778 000043CE B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to

 38780 000043D3 F9                      	stc
 38781 000043D4 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 38782 000043D6 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 38783                                  
 38784 000043D8 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38785 000043DA 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 38786                                  
 38787 000043DC 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 38788 000043DF 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 38789 000043E2 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38790 000043E5 F9                      	stc

 38792 000043E8 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38793

 38795 000043EB BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 38796 000043EE 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 38797 000043F0 5E                      	pop	si
 38798 000043F1 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 38799 000043F4 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 38800 000043F7 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 38801 000043F9 F9                      	stc
 38802 000043FA CD21                    	int	21h
 38803 000043FC 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38804                                  
 38805 000043FE 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38806 00004400 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 38807                                  
 38808 00004402 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 38809 00004405 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 38810 00004408 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 38811 0000440A 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 38812 0000440B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 38813 0000440C 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?

 38815                                  
 38816                                  	;if	bugfix
 38817 00004412 E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 38818                                  	;endif

 38910                                  getcountrydestination:
 38911                                  
 38912                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38913                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38914                                  ;
 38915                                  ;input: al - data id
 38916                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38917                                  ;on return:
 38918                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38919                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38920                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38921                                  
 38922                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38923                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38924                                  
 38925                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38926                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 38927                                  
 38928 0000445F 51                      	push	cx
 38929                                  	;add	di,74
 38930 00004460 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 38931                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 38932 00004463 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 38933 00004466 47                      	inc	di
 38934 00004467 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 38935                                  
 38936                                  getcntrydest:
 38937 00004468 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 38938 0000446B 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 38939                                  
 38940 0000446D 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 38941 00004471 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 38942                                  
 38943 00004473 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 38944 00004476 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 38945                                  
 38946                                  getcntrydest_1:
 38947                                  	;add	di,41
 38948 00004478 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 38949                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 38950 0000447B E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 38951 0000447D F9                      	stc
 38952                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38953                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 38954                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38955 0000447E 59                      	pop	cx
 38956 0000447F C3                      	retn
 38957                                  
 38958                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 38959                                  	; 10/09/2023

 38962                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?

 38971                                  
 38972                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 38973                                  	;les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 38974                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38975 00004485 26C43D                  	les	di,[es:di]
 38976                                  ;getcntrydest_exit:
 38977 00004488 59                      	pop	cx
 38978 00004489 C3                      	retn
 38979                                  
 38980                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38981                                  
 38982                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38983                                  
 38984                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38985                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38986                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38987                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38988                                  ;
 38989                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38990                                  ;	 be moved.
 38991                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38992                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38993                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38994                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38995                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38996                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38997                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38998                                  
 38999 0000448A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39000 0000448B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39001 0000448E F9                      	stc
 39002 0000448F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39003 00004491 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39004 00004492 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39005                                  
 39006 00004494 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39007 00004496 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39008 00004498 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39009 0000449A F9                      	stc
 39010 0000449B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39011                                  ricb_exit:
 39012 0000449D C3                      	retn
 39013

 39015                                  
 39016                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 39017                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023
 39018                                  %if 0
 39019                                  
 39020                                  set_country_path:
 39021                                  
 39022                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39023                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39024                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39025                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39026                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39027                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39028                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39029                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39030                                  
 39031                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39032                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39033                                  
 39034                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39035                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39036                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39037                                  
 39038                                  	push	si
 39039                                  
 39040                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39041                                  	push	es
 39042                                  	pop	ds
 39043                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39044                                  
 39045                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39046                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39047                                  
 39048                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39049                                  	inc	si
 39050                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39051                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39052                                  
 39053                                  scp_default_drv:
 39054                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39055                                  	int	21h
 39056                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39057                                  
 39058                                  scp_setdrv:
 39059                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39060                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39061                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39062                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39063                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39064                                  
 39065                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39066                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39067                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39068                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39069                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39070                                  
 39071                                  scp_root_dir:
 39072                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39073                                  scp_path:
 39074                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39075                                  
 39076                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39077                                  scpath_exit:
 39078                                  
 39079                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39080                                  	push	es
 39081                                  	pop	ds
 39082                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39083                                  
 39084                                  	pop	si
 39085                                  	retn
 39086                                  
 39087                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39088                                  
 39089                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39090                                  
 39091                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39092                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39093                                  ;carry set if not.
 39094                                  
 39095                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39096                                  
 39097                                  	push	ax
 39098                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39099                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39100                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39101                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39102                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39103                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39104                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39105                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39106                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39107                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39108                                  
 39109                                  cdletter_no:
 39110                                  	stc
 39111                                  cdletter_exit:
 39112                                  	pop	ax
 39113                                  	retn
 39114                                  
 39115                                  %endif
 39116

 39119                                  move_asciiz:

 39121                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target

 39123                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 39124                                  
 39125                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39126                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 39127                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 39128                                  
 39129                                  masciiz_loop:
 39130                                  	; 10/09/2023

 39132 000044A1 A4                      	movsb

 39134                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 39135 000044A2 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 39136 000044A4 C3                      	retn

 39813                                  
 39814                                  %if (number3mod>0) & (number3mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 39815 00004D6A 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number3mod) db 0
 39816                                  %endif
 39817                                  
 39818                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 39819                                  ; 09/12/2022 - MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS:3D20h ;;; SI_end = 3D20h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS 
 39820                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
 39821                                  
 39822                                  ;MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:5899h
 39823

 39826                                  
 39827                                  ; 09/12/2022
 39828                                  ;
 39829                                  ;bss_start:
 39830                                  ;
 39831                                  ;ABSOLUTE bss_start
 39832                                  ;
 39833                                  ;alignb 16
 39834                                  
 39835                                  SI_end:  ; SI_end equ $
 39836

 39838                                  
 39839                                  ;sysinitseg	ends
 39840

 39844                                  ; 09/12/2022 - MSDOS 5.0 SYSINIT:SI_end = SYSINIT:3D20h

 39847                                  DOSLOADSEG	equ SYSINITSEG+((SYSINITSIZE+15)/16)
